'' A high-octane adventure comedy , `` Cars '' features the voice talents of Owen Wilson , Paul Newman and Bonnie Hunt , and has wide assortment of cars as characters who get their kicks on Route 66.+ Cossacks 2 : Battle for Europe Sviluppato : GSC Game World Pubblicato : GSC World Publishing Informazioni giocoLet the battle begin ! The Cossacks II : Battle for Europe add-on continues the renowned Cossacks II : Napoleonic Wars game . It depicts the rather short historic period of the Napoleonic wars . The Napoleon wars changed Europe forever , leading to the formation of empires and putting an end to almost one thousand years of constant strife between small states . The game provides mass-scale battles between thousands-strong armies of the nations involved conflicts during this period . The theatres of operation introduce France , Britain , Austria , Russia , Prussia , Egypt , and three nations not represented the original game – Spain , the Grand Duchy of Warsaw ( Poland ) , and the Confederation of the Rhine.The Cossacks II : Battle for Europe reconstructs detail the soldiers ' uniforms weapons and architecture of each nation . Each nation 's army has its unique units and possibilities . The game includes over 180 units 190 buildings and 1200 flora and fauna elements . When developing the combat system the peculiarities of early 19th century warring were taken into account as was the value of formations provisions and troop morale . Tactical tricks utilized by military commanders of the time are fully reflected the game . An `` honest '' system of bullet and cannonball ballistics based on physics is an innovative addition to the Cossacks engine . Other engine features include 3-dimensional landscaping which creates realistic-looking scenery and towns and impacts combat tactics . For example the firing range of subdivision of soldiers or cannon positioned at the top of hill is greater than the firing range of unitstationed on flat terrain.Key features : Control the French , Russians , Austrians , Britons , Prussians , or Egyptians -- master new weapons and tactics during time that redefined the meaning of modern warfare.Fight through historically inspired battles of the 19th century , with massive armies colliding different types of terrain and weather.Battles on real historical scale with tens of thausands of units on one map.Realistic Troop Morale System - Well-fed troops live longer and grow experience to become valuable battlefield assets , while fierce and overwhelming opponents , or marching long distances will cause morale to dropEnhanced diplomacy tools help you create treaties that give you the advantages+ Guilty Gear Isuka Sviluppato : Arc System Works Pubblicato : Arc System Works Informazioni giocoA new Gear arises , its name Leopaldon . Take off from anywhere the world , flying some of the world ’ s most iconic aircraft to any one of 24,000 destinations . Racing mode allows you to compete against friends with four types of racing , including Red Bull Air Race courses , the unlimited Reno National Championship course , as well as cross country , competition sailplane courses and fictional courses like the Hoop and Jet Canyon . Add to your collection of aircraft and improve the fidelity of your world with FSX Add-ons.The inclusion of AI-controlled jetways , fuel trucks and moving baggage carts , adds extra realism to the experience of flying at busy airports.Whether you want to challenge your friends to heart-pounding race or just take the scenery , FSX Steam Edition will immerse you dynamic , living world that brings realistic flying experience into your home.Download size : 16.4GBPLEASE NOTEMicrosoft Flight Simulator X : Steam Edition ( FSX : Steam Edition ) is functionally similar to the boxed version of Microsoft Flight Simulator X ( MSFSX ) . We have worked extensively with third party developers to make sure the two products can work alongside each other , however due to the wide range of add-on products available for MSFSX , we can not guarantee that your existing content will work with Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition.The Flight Simulator X Software Development Kit ( SDK ) is not included with FSX : Steam Edition.If you already have MSFSX installed on your PC and are concerned about running the two games alongside each other , you may wish to consider installing FSX : Steam Edition on separate PC.If you already have MSFSX and add-ons installed they will only be accessible through your existing installation . They will not be duplicated across the original edition and Steam Edition of the simulator.Included AircraftAugusta Westland EH101 ( Helicopter ) Airbus A321AirCreation 582L Trike UltralightBeechcraft Baron 58Beechcraft King Air 350Bell 206B JetRanger ( Helicopter ) Boeing 737-800Boeing 747-400Boeing F/A-18Bombardier CRJ700Bombardier LearJet 45Cessna C172SP SkyhawkCessna C208B Grand CaravanDe Havilland DHC-2 BeaverDG Flugzeugbau DG-808SDouglas DC3Extra 300SGumman G21A GooseMaule M7 OrionMaule M7 Orion ( on skis ) Mooney BravoNorth American P-51D MustangPiper J-3 CubRobinson R22 Beta II ( Helicopter ) + Sid Meier 's Railroads ! Le autorità sovietiche stabilirono `` Zona Esclusione '' 30 km attorno deserto nucleare , 2006 seconda esplosione scosse reattore , cancellando qualsiasi essere vivente portando confini Zona espandersi verso l'esterno . Da epicentro arrivarono ondate creature mutate , radiazioni letali , strana , anomala energia . La Zona venne circondata dall'esercito , sparato vista chiunque abbastanza sciocco sfidare orrori interno.Ora 2012 , l'uomo avventurato sempre cuore Zona guidato notizie strani `` artefatti '' imbevuti energia anomala . I mercenari cacciatori taglie competono recupero artefatti , prezzi esorbitanti mercato nero . Altri cercano trovare verità dietro Zona , mentre alcuni limitano fare baldoria nell'illegalità desolata luogo . The expansion focuses on the time periods after the invention of gunpowder and delivers 11 unique and challenging scenarios created by the development team at Firaxis as well as esteemed members of the Community . Beyond the Sword also includes ten new civilizations , sixteen new leaders , five new wonders , and variety of new units that offer even more fun and exciting ways for players to expand their civilization 's power as they strive for world domination.Expanded Epic Game : Adds massive increase of new units , buildings , and technologies to the epic game with tremendous amount of effort focused on the late game.New Game Scenarios : 11 new scenarios custom-designed by the team at Firaxis and some members of the Fan Community.New Civilizations : 10 new civilizations , such as Portugal , Babylonians , and Netherlands and their associated unique units and buildings.More Civilization Leaders : Sixteen new leaders , both for the new civilizations as well as additional leaders for existing civilizations , including Hammurabi of the Babylonians , Abraham Lincoln of the United States , and Sitting Bull of the Native Americans.Corporations : A new game feature similar to religion allows players to found companies and spread them throughout the world . Each corporation provides benefits exchange for certain resources.Espionage : Now available earlier the game , this feature offers players many new ways to spy on opponents , stir citizen unrest and defend government secrets.Events : New random events - such as natural disasters and pleas for help or demands from their citizens - challenge players with obstacles that must be overcome for their civilization to prosper.New Wonders : Five new wonders await discovery , including the Statue of Zeus , Cristo Redentor , the Shwedagon Paya , and the Mausoleum of Maussollos.Expanded Space Victory : Winning the race to Alpha Centauri will now require more strategic planning and tactical decision making.Apostolic Palace : The United Nations is available earlier the game , providing way to win diplomatic victory earlier . In addition , new resolutions expand the available diplomatic options.Advanced Starts : A major fan request , this new feature enables players to 'buy ' components of custom-tailored empire and begin play the later part of the game , allowing one to experience many of the new features of the expansion shorter amount of time.Advanced AI : The greatly-enhanced AI now relies more on smart play and less on handicap bonuses to remain competitive , providing more consistent challenge throughout the course of the game , both economically and militarily . The ways which the AI attempt to achieve victory have also been expanded.+ Bioshock Sviluppato : 2K Boston 2K Australia Pubblicato : 2K Informazioni giocoBioShock is shooter unlike any you 've ever played , loaded with weapons and tactics never seen . You 'll have complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers , but you 'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon : you . Injectable plasmids give you super human powers : blast electrical currents into water to electrocute multiple enemies , or freeze them solid and obliterate them with the swing of wrench.No encounter ever plays out the same , and no two gamers will play the game the same way.Biologically modify your body : send fire storming from your fingertips and unleash swarm of killer hornets hatched from the veins your arms.Hack devices and systems , upgrade your weapons and craft new ammo variants.Turn everything into weapon : the environment , your body , fire and water , and even your worst enemies.Explore an incredible and unique art deco world hidden deep under the ocean.BioShock : Breaking the MoldA free download that takes an inside look at the art of BioShock . Grazie quantità doppia armi rispetto offerte Fallout 3 , disposizione grande numero modi nuovi entusiasmanti affrontare minacce wasteland abitanti luogo . Inoltre , ingegneri Vault-Tec escogitato nuovo sistema configurazione armi permette smanettare giocattolini rilevare modifiche apportate tempo reale.Lascialo correre ! + Pound of Ground Sviluppato : Centauri Production Pubblicato : Bohemia Interactive Informazioni giocoPound of Ground , story driven crazy shoot 'em up with red car and LOTS of zombies.The game combines action elements - wide range of advanced weapons , fights with various bosses and spectacular , endless battles with the crowds of the undead - with gripping story full of unexpected disclosures and peculiar characters.Key features : A well-written story full of turns of events ; it 's mainly about putting things right , about love and ultimately about saving the whole cityDuels with variously designed bosses , but also with the crowds of undead enemiesScenes from 'behind the shut curtain ' that add flavour and humour to the storyA number of different tasks ensures extended and variegated playabilityUnique gameplay elements+ Gothic Universe Edition ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Pubblicato : IIncludes Gothic 1 , Gothic II : Gold Edition , Gothic 3.Gothic 1War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana . Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed lot of ore to forge enough weapons , should his army stand against this threat . Whoever breaks the law these darkest of times is sentenced to serve the giant penal colony of Khorinis , mining the so much needed ore.The whole area , dubbed `` the Colony '' , is surrounded by magical barrier , sphere two kilometers diameter , sealing off the penal colony from the outside world . The barrier can be passed from the outside – but once inside , nobody can escape . The barrier was double-edged sword - soon the prisoners took the opportunity and started revolt . The Colony became divided into three rivaling factions and the king was forced to negotiate for his ore , not just demand it.You are thrown through the barrier into this prison . With your back against the wall , you have to survive and form volatile alliances until you can finally escape.Gothic II : Gold EditionGothic II : Gold Edition brings together the excitement of Gothic II and the add-on Night of the Raven to your fingertips ! You have torn down the magical barrier and released the prisoners of the Mine Valley . Now the former criminals of the forests and mountains are causing trouble around the capital of Khorinis . The town militia is powerless due to their low amount of force–outside of the town , everyone is helpless against the attacks of the bandits.Gothic 3A nameless hero becomes legend ! Myrtana , world upheaval : overrun by orcs from the dark lands the north , King Rhobar is defending Vengard , the former stronghold of the humans , with his last troop of followers . Chaos reigns without : rebels are offering resistance , and the Hashishin of the south are openly collaborating with the orcs.Rumours that the nameless hero of Khorinis is on his way to the mainland spawn both hope and worry . Whose side will he take ? Who will feel his wrath , who enjoy his favor ? Only one thing is sure : his deeds are going to change Myrtana forever ... Liberation or annihilitaion – the fate of the world of Gothic lies your hands ! Create your own individual gaming experience through different solution paths.Dynamic , action-packed combat system : choose between Fast Attacks , deadly whirlwind close combat , or shooting from distance.Immerse yourself the most colorful and authentic fantasy world of time – Myrtana awaits you ! + Call of Duty : Black Ops Xbox ONE ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Treyarch Pubblicato : Activision Informazioni giocoLa grande serie action prima persona tempi , dopo successo strepitoso , l'anno scorso , blockbuster 'Call of Duty® : Modern Warfare 2 ' , ritorna conCall of Duty® : Black Ops.Call of Duty® : Black Opsti porta dietro linee nemiche ; qualità membro un'unità special forces d'élite , dovrai cimentarti guerra copertura , dimostrare valore operazioni segrete conflitti esplosivi coinvolgono l'intero pianeta . Per corti Inghilterra , Francia Spagna giungono intrepidi esploratori , ansiosi viaggiare attraverso l'Atlantico cerca via occidentale Cina Indie . Troveranno nuova rotta commerciale scopriranno innumerevoli ricchezze coste Asiatiche ? O forse correranno secca terre scoprire strada ? Saranno popoli indigeni disposti conoscenza prospettive commercio presentate , batteranno invasori madrepatria ? Quali ricchezze , fama , opportunità attendono coloro sfidano acque sconosciute ? Quale percorso sceglierai ? Chi prevarrà lotta supremazia nuovo mondo ? Spagna – IsabellaIsabella I stata Regina Castiglia Leon 30 anni , marito Ferdinand , gettarono basi consolidamento Spagna . Per ruolo nell'unificazione Spagna , patrocinio viaggi Colombo verso l'America , mettendo fine Reconquista ( ricattura ) Penisola Iberica , Isabella considerata amate importanti monarca Corona Spagnola.Inca – PachacutiPachacuti nono comandante Regno Cusco , colui regime espanse regno un'esteso impero - Tawantinsuyu . L'impero Inca Pachacuti estende giorni moderni Chile all'Equador , includendo maggior parte Peru , Bolivia , l'Argentina nord , gettando basi fondazione grande Impero Inca venire.L'anno 1492 . Per corti Inghilterra , Francia Spagna giungono intrepidi esploratori , ansiosi viaggiare attraverso l'Atlantico cerca via occidentale Cina Indie . Troveranno nuova rotta commerciale scopriranno innumerevoli ricchezze coste Asiatiche ? O forse correranno secca terre scoprire strada ? Saranno popoli indigeni disposti conoscenza prospettive commercio presentate , batteranno invasori madrepatria ? Quali ricchezze , fama , opportunità attendono coloro sfidano acque sconosciute ? Each map brings new gameplay experience and fresh visuals , with characteristics such as foxholes , tunnels and dense jungles from where the enemy can launch surprise attacks . Also , 15 classic Vietnam-era weapons and 6 vehicles are available from the moment you go online.All four multiplayer game modes from Battlefield : Bad Company 2 , including the genre-defining Conquest Mode , will be playable Battlefield : Bad Company 2 Vietnam . The expansion is integrated with the full game persistence , so no matter what theatre of war you participate , you will continue to level up your soldier as usual.Key Features5 Brand New Maps : From the rice fields of the Phu Bai Valley to the napalm scorched earth of Hill 137 , five distinct Vietnam-based maps each bring fresh visual and gameplay experience.6 Immortalized Vehicles : Skim the treetops the iconic American helicopter . Drive the sturdy Russian T54 tank and the nimble US PBR `` Pibber '' patrol boat , plus three more vehicles immortalized the Vietnam war.15 Characteristic Weapons : Charge into battle with 15 new weapons modeled on their real life counter-parts , including the rare Navy SEAL XM22 machinegun and the characteristic M79 `` Blooper '' Grenade Launcher.Rocking 60 's Soundtrack : Listen to 8 radio channels in-game , featuring 2 hours of time typical tracks , including `` Ride of the Valkyries '' and `` Fortunate Son '' by CCR.True War Dialogue : All-new voiceovers for both American and Vietnamese forces , based on authentic communication from the Vietnam War.Online DisclaimerINTERNET CONNECTION , ONLINE AUTHENTICATION AND ACCEPTANCE OF END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT REQUIRED TO PLAY . Rich gameplay and engaging atmosphere propel the story and captures attention , promising danger and exploration throughout the many quests and video sequences . An artistic system of attack and defense moves has been integrated into the game . Parries and changing hit results creates real opportunity for tactics and excitement , as the AI engage combat and employ strategy of their own . The game also offers extreme flexibility the weapon and armament design possibilities . The cornerstone at the heart of this feature is the newly created 'CRAFT'™ tool . Players can break down items into their basic materials and create new unique items . `` Two Worlds II '' is also graphically superb . The powerful GRACE™ engine offers technological highlights such as an unlimited number of dynamic light sources , 24 bit HDR post-processing , and Real Eye Adaptation . It will drastically reduce loading times , improve general game performance , and enable full gameplay with only moderate hardware requirements.Key features : A flexible combat system with variable attack moves , parrying and special tricksState-of-the-art technology , thanks to powerful GRACE™ engine and special toolsLots of mini-games for breaking up gameplayIntuitive user interface for the DEMONS™ Magic system and the PAPAC™ Alchemy systemMercenaries and magically-created beings accompany the playerComplex object management with movable and usable itemsSpecial CRAFT™ tool enables the individual configuration of armor and weaponsMany Boss opponents , including special combat strategies and unique rewardsFlexible MoSens system guarantees realistic every day and combat movementsVarious ways of moving , like walking , running , sprinting , riding , swimming , sailing and teleportingCaptivating background story with numerous cutscenesExtensive Multiplayer part including building/setup simulation+ Black Mirror II Sviluppato : Cranberry Production Pubblicato : THQ Nordic Informazioni giocoWhen solitary Darren Michaels befriends the beautiful Angelina , he has no idea what the fates hold store for him . Scenario DescriptionIn Paradise Found , players take on the role of one of the four great Polynesian kingdoms as they strive to become the dominant culture Polynesia . All-new technology and social policy trees unlock powerful advantages to players , including the fearsome Maori Warrior and the enigmatic Moai . Special changes to the game rules allow players to build expansive kingdoms quickly without impeding their cultural growth , but the seas of the Pacific are huge and land is at premium among the atolls and islands . Take the best islands for yourself , and prove your mana as ruler as you build Polynesia to stand the test of time ! Polynesia Ruler – KamehamehaKamehameha was the first ruler to unite of the Big Islands of Hawai ' under his rule 1791 , and reformed many of the island 's laws to protect its people . This is police state where high school stadiums have become detention centers , and shopping malls shelter armored attack vehicles . Featuring brand new AI system inspired by the scriptures that influenced Japanese warfare , the millennia old Chinese “ Art of War ” , the Creative Assembly brings the wisdom of Master Sun Tsu to Total War : SHOGUN 2 . Analysing this ancient text enabled the Creative Assembly to implement easy to understand yet deep strategical gameplay.CONQUERthe islands of Japan the 16th century . This robust expansion covers the entire scope of time from founding your first Pantheon of the Gods and spreading religion across the world , to deploying your spies enemy cities order to steal information and technology.As you move through the ages , you ’ ll interact with new types of city-states , engage new city-state quests and global competitions , and master exciting new systems for land and naval combat . Civilization V : Gods and Kings will also include nine new civilizations , nine new wonders , three original scenarios , and dozens of new units , buildings , and techs that will offer even more ways for players to expand their empire and dominate the world.Key Features : Expanded Epic Game : The core game experience has been greatly expanded with the addition of new technologies ( like Combined Arms ) , 27 new units ( like the new 1-hex ranged unit Machine Gunner ) , 13 new buildings ( like the Bomb Shelter ) , and 9 new Wonders ( see below ) . Additionally , there are even more new units and buildings included the three new Scenarios for modders to use.New Civilizations : The expansion will deliver 9 new civilizations , such as Carthage , Netherlands , the Celts , and the Maya ( it is 2012 , after ) , along with their unique traits , units and buildings . The expansion also includes 9 new leaders including William I , Prince of Orange , Boudicca and Pacal the Great.Religion : A righteous people will seek out Faith to found Pantheon of the Gods . As your Faith becomes stronger , you can cultivate Great Prophets who build on these simple beliefs to create religion that you can customize and enhance as desired . Are you tolerant of other religions or is this the one true faith ? Are you focused on Gold , Arts or Military ? Beliefs can even unlock custom buildings that only people of your religion can construct . Great prophets , missionaries and inquisitors help you spread your beliefs to other lands and gain the alliances of City States , and like-minded civilizations.Enhanced Diplomacy and Espionage : Establish embassies at foreign courts for closer ties ( or clandestine operations ) . As the religions of the world start settling , and the world moves into the Renaissance , you unlock your first spy ( with more to ) . Send them out to establish surveillance of foreign cities , steal advanced technologies from your strongest or wisest competitors , or interfere with city-state alliances . All of your actions can have diplomatic impact if discovered , so always tread carefully.City-States : Two new city-state types have been added ( Mercantile and Religious ) to bring new advantages to the table . The city-state quest system has received complete overhaul to decrease the importance of gold and add whole range of new quests that further the narrative of the game , as well as make the diplomatic victory more varied option . Ally with Marrakech to get access to their unique luxury resources ! Vatican City and Jerusalem are holy cities that play key roles the religious struggle.World Domination : The fight for world domination is now more dynamic than ever before . The Gods and Kings expansion features reworked combat system and AI that puts more emphasis on balanced army composition . The new system allows your lines to stand longer than they could before , so you , as player , can make smarter tactical decisions without worrying about single unlucky roll of the dice.Naval Combat : Your navy is now split into two different ship types , melee and ranged . This means that no coastal city should be considered safe , and can now fall to surprise naval attack . Additionally , embarked units now have Defensive Embarkation , and can stack with naval unit for extra protection . Add to this the new Great Admiral , and the high seas have become much more dangerous place.New Wonders : There will be 9 new Wonders with new effects including Neuschwanstein , the Great Mosque of Djenne , the Terracotta Army , the Great Firewall , and the Hubble Space Telescope.Three new Scenarios : Medieval : Grow your medieval kingdom into one of the great nations of Renaissance Europe , fending off outside invasions from Mongols and Ottoman Turks and fighting the religious wars of the Crusades and Reformation ! Fall of Rome : Play as either Eastern Rome or Western Rome trying to fend off the barbarians OR as one of the barbarians themselves.Empires of the Smoky Skies : Build flying airships and huge tractor-like tanks from the unique tech tree of this Victorian science-fiction scenario , and use them to spread your empire across the pre-industrial world.Note - DemoThe demo is available on PC only+ Crusader Kings II : African Unit Pack Sviluppato : Paradox Development Studio Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Riguardo contenutoEnhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these unique unit graphics for the African states south of the Sahara : NubiaAbyssiniaMaliSonghayGhana+ Crusader Kings II : Sword of Islam Sviluppato : Paradox Development Studio Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Riguardo contenutoEurope is turmoil . Features include , gripping , storyline reminiscent of Apocalypse Now and Heart of Darkness but set ruined Dubai , tactical squad-based Delta Force gameplay throughout horizontally and vertically oriented world , devastating sandstorms which can be used combat , variety of multiplayer modes and maps , and deep support featuring two factions.It ’ s been 6 months since Dubai was wiped off the map by cataclysmic sandstorm . Thousands of lives were lost , including those of American soldiers sent to evacuate the city . Today , the city lies buried under sand , the world ’ s most opulent ruin . Now , mysterious radio signal is picked-up from Dubai , and Delta Recon Team is sent to infiltrate the city . Their mission is simple : Locate survivors and radio for Evac . What they find is city the grip of war . To save Dubai , they ’ ll have to find the man at the heart of its madness—Col . John Konrad.GameplaySpec Ops : The Line is an action-packed Third-Person Shooter that delivers heart pounding physically close combat through squad-based play mechanic . Players lead team of three characters , Captain Martin Walker , Lieutenant Adams and Sergeant Lugo . Each character has his own distinct personality and specialized skills , and the mature story they each play role explores the dark side of war realistic way , which there are no good outcomes , only hard choices . As missions are completed more advanced weapons and equipment are made available . In addition , the desert environment of Dubai is brought into the game unique way with stunning visuals , and dynamic sandstorms that actively effect level designs , and which can be used to help and hinder progress . The vertical interiors of Dubai high rise buildings also provide tactical advantages and risks that can used be by players . Multiplayer campaigns bring new modes and unusual situations and environments to expand the single player experience.Key FeaturesA new portrayal of the military shooter experience with twisting narrative uncertainties.Action packed 3rd Person Shooter gameplay provides an up-close and personal view into the brutality and emotion within the combat.Command an intelligent and powerful squad of Delta-Force soldiers dangerous and unpredictable combat zone.Cross “ The Line ” mature story that explores the dark side of war , where there are no bright outcomes , only bad or worse choices.Unique Dubai setting strikes the imagination and transports players to larger-than-life playground for vertical gameplay and stunning visuals.Sand-filled Dubai provides new gameplay experiences including sand avalanches , and powerful , disorienting sandstorm combat.Customisable , Class-Based , Blazing Multiplayer+ Endless Space - Definitive Edition Sviluppato : AMPLITUDE Studios Pubblicato : SEGA Informazioni giocoQuesta un'antica galassia , prima forma vita intelligente stata civiltà chiamiamo Eterni . You are Sgt James Heller , husband to deceased wife and child and soldier left simply to die.As the game ’ s all-new infected protagonist , players will experience Sgt James Heller cutting bloody swathe through the wastelands of post-viral New York Zero . Equipped with unparalleled new shapeshifting powers , players will gradually build vast genetic arsenal of deadly new biological weapons and abilities as they hunt , kill and consume their way toward the ultimate goal – to kill…Alex…Mercer ! Customize Your Killer : Prototype 2 delivers the raw power of character customization back into your hands , allowing players to creatively mix-n-match devastating range of new Mutation perks into their ultimate Prototype . Faster and bigger locomotion abilities , sharper claws or even enhanced disguise abilities – the choice is yours ! Hunt – Kill – Become : Imagine having the power to track down any enemy by unleashing powerful sonar-pulse from your body ! Sgt James Heller brings an all-new dimension to the Prototype experience by letting you Hunt , Kill and Become anyone standing your way . Disguise yourself as soldier , scientist or anyone at whilst absorbing their memories and acquiring new abilities . It doesn ’ t get any better than this ! Bring Down the Devil : Gamers will experience the epic story of Sgt James Heller attempting to take down the devil himself… Alex Mercer . Unraveled against the explosive backdrop of New York Zero and it ’ s vicious factions warring for control over the infection , Prototype 2 sets the stage for the ultimate showdown “ event ” videogame of 2012.Size Does Matter : Utilizing the unparalleled technology of Radical ’ s proprietary ‘ Titanium 2.0 ’ engine , Prototype 2 will redefine gamer ’ s expectations of over-the-top open world action . Witness building-sized Infected behemoths bullrushing entire city streets , whilst gliding and parkouring across swarms of highly trained Blackwatch soldiers . Prototype 2 = Bigger , Badder , Better ! New York Zero : An All New Open-World Hunting Ground ! The New York that humanity has to know and love over the years no longer exists…it is now New York Zero , or more simply , NYZ.PROTOTYPE 2 ’ sNYZ open-world sandbox is broken up into three completely distinct zones . From the heavily militarized “ Green Zone ” , to the overcrowded refugee shanty town camps of the quarantined “ Yellow Zone ” , the way to the war-ravaged nightmare known as the “ Red Zone ” – this is city unlike anything gamer ’ s have experienced before . The home of Alex Mercer , the Red Zone portrays nightmarish vision where the Blacklight virus has completely overrun the city ’ s shattered skyscrapers and population , with infection and the risk of death at every corner.+ Prototype 2 ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Radical Entertainment Pubblicato : Activision Informazioni giocoWelcome to New York Zero.The sequel to Radical Entertainment ’ s best-selling open-world action game of 2009 , Prototype® 2takes the unsurpassed carnage of the original Prototype and continues the experience of becoming the ultimate shape-shifting weapon . You are Sgt James Heller , husband to deceased wife and child and soldier left simply to die.As the game ’ s all-new infected protagonist , players will experience Sgt James Heller cutting bloody swathe through the wastelands of post-viral New York Zero . Equipped with unparalleled new shapeshifting powers , players will gradually build vast genetic arsenal of deadly new biological weapons and abilities as they hunt , kill and consume their way toward the ultimate goal – to kill…Alex…Mercer ! Are you ready to murder your maker ? Key Features : The Power of Tendrils : Prepare to unleash the ultimate form of shape-shifting devastation . At the outset of match things seem quite basic : 3D game board pits two opponents against each other seemingly ordinary game of chess . The game board itself is set one of six available environments , each with its own unique landscape and presentation features . Disturbati distruzione causata eventi Guild Wars , cinque Elder Dragons stati risvegliati notizia flash : affatto contenti.I draghi : Primordus , scacciato Charr patria ( vedi sotto maggiori informazioni razze ) ; Zhaitan , drago anziano morto ; Mordremoth , drago anziano giungla ; Kralkatorrik drago cristallo , trova Deserto Cristallo Jormag , drago ghiaccio . C ' sesto drago , dice dorma sotto mari , grado comunicare telepaticamente fratelli : conosciuto drago mare profondo.A sud mappa gioco , continente Cantha stato tagliato fuori clima politico isolazionista xenofobo , rafforzato marina morti Zhaitan , assicura navi larga . Anche continente Elona stato tagliato fuori ; battaglia cominciare , dando speranza ancora risorse vale pena combattere.Il risveglio Zhaitan provocato riemergere regno Orr , volta inondato completamente Battle Isles , spazzandole via mappa . È chiaro passato tempo primo gioco , poiché stati enormi progressi tecnologia , nell'unificazione linguaggio miglioramenti nell'abbigliamento nell'armatura.Cosa ’ sapereMolti giochi MMO basano trama – molti troverebbero impossibile – gioco diverso . Non solo trama , risponde azioni giocatori , rendendo gioco ancora coinvolgente divertente.Devi scegliere razza professione , determinano entrambe abilità armi potrai accedere . C ' vasta gamma abilità , puoi sceglierne dieci ; vale pena , quindi , pensare modo strategico fase personalizzazione . Ci poi otto discipline crafting , puoi padroneggiarne due . Se scegli poi cambi idea , puoi passare altro , costo.La sensazione generale gioco simile gioco cooperativo massa , poiché danno fare combattere nemico comune eventi PvE , verificano regolarmente . Anche fuori eventi , persone possono ucciderti ( te ) , trovato mina scavare , altri possono unirsi te senza nessuno due perda l'altro.Parte gioco consiste completare missioni NPC devi preoccuparti trovare bacheche missiomi : sufficiente avvicinarsi NPC farli chattare dirti cosa bisogno.Tutto ciò aumenta XP ( punti esperienza ) abilità , quindi presto livello 80 , punto tutte battaglie attività diventano disponibili te.Il gioco vanta grafica meravigliosa : laghi lava bollente , strutture sottomarine , immense foreste altro ancora , ' sempre qualcosa guardare ' sempre qualcosa nuovo fare.Il gioco ripete , particolare dungeon affollati , prendi nota trovare kit pronto soccorso medicine : ' classe guaritori gioco , devi essere medico ! Esplora dungeon - diversi , vale pena , assicurati cercare oggetti curativi - classi guaritori qui , devi farlo solo.Qualcosa unico gioco modalità World vs World ( WvW ) , Player vs Player ( PvP ) , stata scalata giocata pianeti un'esperienza davvero enorme.Di razza ? Ci cinque gare scegliere : Umano : abitanti originari TyriaCharr – combattono umani patria ancestrale , AscalonNorn – Guerrieri nordici , costretti fuggire Jormag , drago ghiaccio appena risvegliatoAsura – popolo tecnologicamente avanzato , stato costretto superficie dopo Primordus , primo drago risvegliarsi , cacciati case sotterranee foresteSylvari : estranei nuova razza : molto sconosciuto , connessione mistica Elder Dragons . Pubblicato : Spooky Squid Games Inc. Informazioni giocoThey Bleed Pixels is fiendishly difficult action platformer inspired by H.P . Lovecraft and classic horror . Rendered distinct visual style that blends pixel art with paper and ink textures , They Bleed Pixels is singular mix of intense platforming and fierce beat-em-up action . At the core of its fighting system is simple one-button combat scheme with surprising depth and versatility . Button mashing is discouraged while kicking shadowy monsters into saws , pits and spikes is rewarded , thanks to unique system that lets you earn and place your own checkpoints through stylish kills . The fancier your kills , the faster you fill the checkpoint meter.Story : When young girl arrives at the Lafcadio Academy for Troubled Young Ladies , she 's unprepared for the violent nightmares that plague her dreams and transport her to other worlds . Worse yet , her dreams are intruding into her waking life , slowly altering her flesh into the demonic form of her night terrors . Can she destroy the mysterious blood-soaked book that appears to be the root of her troubles or will her transmutation from girl to clawed horror become complete ? Key Features : Extra tight controls : One-button attack system favors skilled combat over complicated combos and button-mashing . Super precise platforming controls let you stop and start on dime while pulling off gravity-defying dashes and double jumps.Eleven massive levels to fight through and explore , each with unique visuals and music . Unlock additional bonus levels and guest levels from indie game developers based on their own creations : They Bleed Ponycorns , They Bleed Stardust , exp.Unique checkpoint system rewards fancy kills with save spot you can carry with you . Hold on to it for extra points or drop it right away to preserve your progress.Becoming monster stabbing master with individual level rankings as well as 150 skill-based achievements . There 's lots to aim for after you 've completed the game.Standard and Novice difficulty to match your skill level.Record , playback and share your best playthroughs with online leaderboards for speed and high score ! Riguardo contenutoThe spiritual successor of Allied General is here ! The Allied Corps Campaign takes the award winning Panzer Corps game system and puts you command of the Western Allies . Starting the Western Desert and commanding the British 8th Army , the player takes on Italian forces with support from the German Afrika Korps . The war then moves on to Sicily and then must fight their way up Italy against stiff German resistance . In 1944 new front will be opened by Operation Overlord , D-Day , and then push on to the Rhine and Berlin.Panzer Corps : Allied Corps is an expansion for Panzer Corps . Allied Corps includes more than 25 new scenarios , over 50 new regular and special elite units , and modified version of existing units to cover the entire war detail from the Western Allies perspective.Features• The campaign contains 30 scenarios , including an allied tutorial based on real WW2 events which links seamlessly into the main campaign.• The Allied Campaign includes action both Africa and Europe , and covers the war from 1940 to 1945 . There are 6 entry points into the campaign , allowing you to start from any year.• 900 units types , divided into 19 unit classes with 20 detailed parameters to indentify units abilities , 17 terrain types affecting gameplay various way• 2 player multiplayer using Slitherine ’ s PBEM++ server with thousands of active players already online . Play against players with Panzer Corps and Afrika Korps giving you access to huge community on day 1.• Units from more than 30 nations are represented including Great Britain , USA , France , Poland , Germany , Italy , Norway , Belgium , Netherlands , Albania , Romania , Greece , India , New Zealand , Australia and more.• Lots of historical and number of what-if scenarios . What if the Russian ’ s didn ’ t stop heading West ! • You can start the campaign as Britain or the USA , and later use mixed British/US core force.• Heroes with great bonuses emerge as your units fight combat.• Track the battle history of your units and watch as they are awarded medals.• Save games and watch replays of them and share them with your friends.• Huge library with information on many tanks and aircraft from sides of the war.• Scenario editor included and extensive modding options are available.+ Dota 2 Sviluppato : Valve Pubblicato : Valve Dota 2 gioco multiplayer online battle arena ( MOBA ) , sequel Dota , Defense of the Ancients , volta nato Warcraft III : Reign of Chaos . È pochissimi giochi popolari veramente “ comunitario ” , stato concepito , testato rilasciato forum comunità.Informazioni giocoNel gioco diviso squadre cinque combatti un'altra squadra simile : gruppi dieci guerra trovano luoghi distinti mappa . Ciascuno dieci giocatori controlla eroe unico , ognuno proprie abilità abilità . Ci 121 personaggi unici ( vedi sotto esempio alcuni essi ) .Gli eroi divisi due gruppi sciolti : Core ( chiamati Carry ) supporti . I supporti utili , qualche modo leggeri , fornendo solido backup senza alcun potere eclatante . I nuclei , d'altra parte , iniziano deboli guadagnano forza potenza fino quando possono `` portare '' l'intera squadra ( qui volte chiamato `` porta '' ) .Devi raccogliere XP ( punti esperienza ) oggetti sconfiggere l'altra squadra , distruggendo `` Antico '' , grande struttura presente base . Allo stesso tempo , devi difendere Antico , poiché avversari cercheranno abbatterlo volta ! Combatti abbattere serie torri difensive raggiungere l'Antico , solito trova dietro quattro serie torri totale ; attenzione servi generati dall'IA chiamati `` creep '' , suggerisce gentilmente nome , insinuano te ! In ogni gioco , squadra Radiant l'altra Dire : Dire creeps dirigono sempre verso torri Radiant cercare distruggerle viceversa.Cose sapereDota 2 gioco adatto principianti , curva apprendimento brutalmente ripida gameplay complesso , volta imparato muoverti , inizierai rilassarti divertirti po ' . Il gioco cerca alleggerire l'atmosfera tavolozza colori brillante allegra giochi parole livello scherzi , potrebbero farti ridere , mentre maledicendo difficoltà capire cosa succedendo.Alla fine , complessità guadagna posto cuore : tenere traccia dieci giocatori vari ( diversi ) incantesimi scatenando diventa molto facile quando comprendi sistemi tradizione gioco , comprese decisioni strane contraddittorie potresti dover affrontare : esempio , piuttosto lasciare nemico abbatta unità intelligenza artificiale ottenere preziosi XP , meglio te sparare all'IA , negando altri premio.Aspettati trascorrere prima settimana gioco principalmente imparando funziona leggere campo battaglia : potresti arrivarci velocemente , consentire almeno settimana toglie pressione spalle . Suggerimento professionisti : gioco avvincente quasi giocare : impara guardando filmati gioco ingresso `` facile '' , comunque semplice.Una volta arrivato punto sai cosa succedendo , solito già investito molto tempo gioco ansioso fare conti vedi.Durante gioco , puoi lasciare battaglie , può essere seccatura quando prendendo batosta , significa quando giocando particolarmente bene , nessun guastafeste può abbandonare terminare prematuramente gioco rovinare vittoria ! Hai bisogno eroe ? Alcuni eroi cercare provare . Tuttavia , ricorda : ogni eroe opposto , nemesi , l'altra squadra potrebbe giocare ! Riki : l'invisibilità permanente livello 6 : possono ucciderti possono vederti ! Drow Ranger : può scatenare enormi quantità danni massimo potenziamento , raggiunto livello 6 ( caso molti eroi ) . Questa nuova espansione aumenta ulteriormente profondità gioco rigiocabilità introducendo commercio internazionale dando nuova importanza cultura diplomazia . Potrai accrescere influenza livello mondiale creando Capolavori , scegliendo un'ideologia popolo proponendo Congresso Mondiale risoluzioni impatto globale . Man mano attraverserai epoche storiche , decisioni impatto duraturo relazioni altre civiltà.Sid Meier 's Civilization V : Brave New World introduce inoltre nove civiltà , otto meraviglie , due scenari , quattro nuove dinamiche gioco decine unità , edifici miglioramenti , offrendo varietà ampia mai strategie costruire potente impero mondo.CARATTERISTICHENuova Vittoria culturale : diffondi cultura livello mondiale fino dominare altre . Crea capolavori Grandi Artisti , Scrittori Musicisti mettili mostra edifici importanti impero Musei , Teatri dell'Opera persino Grande Biblioteca . Usa Archeologi eseguire scavi siti battaglie passato rovine antiche città estrarne inestimabili manufatti culturali . Diventa prima civiltà esercitare un'influenza dominante tutte altre ottenere Vittoria culturale , suscitando l'invidia mondo intero.Nuove Politiche Ideologie : entra nell'Epoca industriale scegli l'ideologia popolo : Uguaglianza , Ordine Autocrazia . Ogni ideologia permette accedere abilità sempre potenti andranno soddisfare requisiti vittoria modi diversi . Le scelte operi influenzeranno relazioni altre civiltà resto gioco.Congresso Mondiale : diplomazia peso decisamente maggiore alleanze città-stato importanti mai . Rivoluziona panorama diplomatico nuovo Congresso Mondiale dedicato questioni critiche l'adozione sanzioni commerciali stati canaglia , limitazione dell'uso risorse , designazione città candidate Giochi Mondiali l'impiego armi nucleari . Risoluzioni internazionali grado cambiare regole gioco , voto scambio , intrigo nuovo meccanismo ottenere Vittoria diplomatica assicurano finale partita eccitante.Rotte commerciali internazionali : rendi città fulcro rotte commerciali terrestri marittime crea ricchezza prosperità popolo , diffondendo stesso tempo religione , influenza culturale scienza . Il numero rotte commerciali aumenta sviluppo economico tecnologico , attraverso realizzazione Meraviglie grazie abilità speciali civiltà . Collegherai città vicina , privilegiando guadagni minori favore rotta sicura , sceglierai percorso lungo rischioso aumentare entrate magari deciderai realizzare rotte interne , trasportando cibo produzione importanza vitale fino angoli remoti impero ? Nuove civiltà , edifici unità : stati introdotti nove leader civiltà , Polonia , Brasile , Portogallo , Zulu tante altre , ognuna particolari tratti distintivi , edifici unità.Nuove Meraviglie : espansione introduce otto nuove Meraviglie , Partenone , Broadway , Globe Theatre Uffizi.Due nuovi scenari : Guerra Civile Americana : combatti `` Guerra Stati '' parte dell'Unione Confederazione , concentrandoti fondamentale teatro operazioni orientale , fra due capitali Richmond Washington.La corsa all'Africa : grandi potenze coloniali mondo gara esplorare Continente Nero estendervi influenza . You are scientist who has suddenly awoken to the realization that you are the lone survivor . The rest of the facility ’ s personnel have been killed – micro-chipped and reactivated as combatants by the facility ’ s central processing AI.Teleglitch : Die More Edition is roguelike top-down shooter with retro pixel graphics . Featuring procedurally generated maps that change with each play through , you will never experience the same facility twice . Clutch your gun , walk down the dark corridors and enter each new room hoping those last few rounds of ammunition will be enough . Feel the anxiety , the paranoia and the sheer terror of Teleglitch.Key FeaturesOver 20 types of enemies to combatMore than 40 types of weapons and items10 levels that radically change their structure every time you play10+ hours of play time ( it gets harder the further you get ) Detailed database with full dossiers of each monsterScavenge random equipment to craft new and deadly gear like The Can Gun ( empty can + nails + explosives ) A sinister narrative filled with greedy military corporations covert experimentsThe risk of permanent death creates an atmosphere of fear and dreadThe Die More Edition features:5 bonus levelsAdditional items and weaponsUpgraded and more deadly enemy AIExpanded dossiers and lore content+ Alien Spidy : Between Rock and Hard Place Sviluppato : Enigma SP Pubblicato : Kalypso Media Digital Riguardo contenutoNow unlock 3 more ridiculously difficult “ Special ” levels , which are set to test your ability and skill to the very extreme ! The smallest mistakes will send you right back to the start of this most brutal and unforgiving level . If you really think that you have what it takes to get Spidy from A to B then be our guest…Determination is what you will need when you are dropped straight into an underwater cave ! No wait , determination and lot of speedy quick reflexes , because without these there is certainly no way you can beat this level . Challenge accepted ? Until now Spidy has never felt so helpless . You have to guide him out of the deepest and darkest depths of the caves ; there is no sign of life anywhere ! Don ’ t be miss lead , there is still plenty of danger this far into the earth ’ s crust , as you are far less control due to wind tunnels , floating spores and unstable stalactites . You ’ ll be more than happy to reach the end , if you can ? ! L'anno 2054 . La magia tornata mondo , risvegliando potenti creature mito leggenda . La tecnologia fonde carne coscienza . Elfi , troll , orchi nani convivono uomini , mentre corporation senza scrupoli sfruttano fino all'osso risorse mondo . Tu Shadowrunner , mercenario vive margini società , all'ombra gigantesche arcologie corporation , sopravvivendo giornata sola base dell'istinto abilità . Quando potenti disperati incarico assegnare , svolgi . Con ogni mezzo necessario.Nella vasta distesa urbana metroplex Seattle , ricerca misterioso killer porterà seguire pista oscuri bassifondi sale fino mega-corporation potenti città . Per emergere illeso ombre Seattle dovrai muoverti molta cautela , reclutare altri Runner padroneggiare potenti forze tecnologia magia.Con inconfondibile mix cyberpunk fantasy , Shadowrun diventato fenomeno culto sin creazione , quasi 25 anni fa . Oggi , creatore Jordan Weisman torna mondo Shadowrun , modernizzando classico trasformandolo RPG tattico turni giocatore singolo.Combattimento tattico avvincente : Quando corri nell'ombra , ogni movimento fondamentale . Scegli attenzione azioni : cerca riparo , lanciati mischia , scaglia palla fuoco mezzo nugolo nemici . Grazie grande varietà armi incantesimi disposizione , dovrai compiere scelte fondamentali ogni istante . Per avere successo dovrai guidare squadra Runner cercando giusto equilibrio combattimento , tecnologia abilità magiche.Avanzamento personaggi base abilità : Scegli archetipo personaggio iniziale fallo progredire ! Street Samurai Physical Adept usano abilità combattimento avanzate dominare campo battaglia . Shaman Mage evocano alleati potenti lanciano incantesimi letali , mentre Rigger Decker forniscono supporto tecnologico proiettando propria coscienza direttamente droni sistemi informatici . Il sistema abilità Shadowrun Returns , privo classi , consente far crescere personaggio direzione preferisci . Vuoi iniziare evocare spiriti panni Shaman orco poi evolverti cyber-specialista armi ? Puoi farlo ! Splendida grafica 2D/3D : Shadowrun Returns unisce dinamismo personaggi illuminazione 3D ricchissimi ambienti disegnati mano . I ritratti illustrati personaggi danno vita ogni dialogo . Esplora mondo ricco dettagli , bassifondi Redmond Barrens sontuosi uffici potenti corporation.+ Shadowrun Returns Sviluppato : Harebrained Schemes Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Informazioni giocoL'UOMO INCONTRA LA MAGIA E LE MACCHINE . Whether it is speed , capacity or low maintenance that you are looking for , these are the vehicles to help you out.Ness TransLink : It 's bit slow and needs lot of maintenance , but the TransLink has unsurpassed capacity to carry passengers . It is fairly slow , so the vehicle will do best on routes with many stops and short distances between them.Stern-Berger Guide : The Guide is the pride of the Stern-Berger factories . While it is n't the fastest vehicle out there , it has special padded seats to make it very comfortable for passengers , and thus it tends to attract lot of customers.Toyoka Iris : The Iris is well-rounded vehicle that performs well . Its speed is average , it has nice capacity , and needs regular amount of maintenance . It has nice and average performance through and through.Comet BussCar : If you need very reliable vehicle that also has high average speed , Comet BussCar is the one for you . Its capacity is quite low , and it is n't the most comfortable to ride , but on other areas it performs exceptionally.ZiA OB : The OB is small , fast vehicle perfect for long routes to remote locations . Your mission it is to reunite broken empire and become the new emperor . Success depends entirely on your ability to efficiently rule your empire , build invincible armies and lead them to victory . Your secret weapons : your tactical insights , your leadership skills and your ability to turn yourself into dragon.Dragon Commander is not just any strategy game - it seamlessly blends real-time strategy gameplay with turn-based campaigning , role-playing an ascending emperor and controlling formidable dragon.Key FeaturesReal time strategy : Command your sea , land and air forces real-time . Combined operations and knowing where and when to hit are crucial elements of any victory.Dragon Combat : During real time strategy mode , you can turn into dragon to support your troops combat and obliterate the enemy using your formidable dragon powers.Turn based campaign : Direct your conquest on the turn-based world map ; plan several moves ahead , build formidable armies and invest the right technology or magic upgrades.Rule your empire : You are the emperor and you make the decisions ! But beware , political balance is easily upset . Each game is different and you 'll find that Dragon Commander needs to make really tough decisions . Feel the effects of your decisions on the battlefield as the war progresses.Single-player , multiplayer and co-op modes : Play the single player story-driven campaign or test your mettle against other Dragon Knights , online or local via LAN . Start your own multiplayer campaign with or against friend . Tanti polli ! + Spelunky Sviluppato : Mossmouth Pubblicato : Mossmouth Informazioni giocoSpelunky is unique platformer with randomized levels that offer challenging new experience each time you play . Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with manner of monsters , traps , and treasure . You 'll have complete freedom while you navigate the fully-destructible environments and master their many secrets . To stay or flee , to kill or rescue , to shop or steal ... Spelunky , the choice is yours and so are the consequences ! Key Features '' Roguelike '' Platforming- Randomly-generated , fully-destructible levels are dense with danger . Quick thinking and deep understanding will keep you alive along the knife 's edge ! Fill Your Journal- Track your progress with dusty explorer 's journal given to you by Yang , your mentor from another age.Local Co-op- Up to 4 players can join up to help or hinder madcap cooperative play.Deathmatch- Unlock 72 diverse , deadly arenas to wage battle against friends or bots.The Daily Challenge- Each day new set of levels is generated for the Daily Challenge , unique mode where you only get one chance day to compete online against the rest of the Steam community.A Colorful Cast- A roster of 20 squishy explorers ( 16 unlockable ) are waiting for you to make their greedy dreams true ! Tough Love- You 're going to die kinds of painful , hilarious , and surprising ways . But with each mistake you 'll learn more about how Spelunky works and get that much closer to solving its deepest mysteries ! 115 giocatori giocando ora Steam+ Fault - Milestone One Sviluppato : ALICE IN DISSONANCE Pubblicato : ALICE IN DISSONANCE Informazioni giocoLa versione Steam Director 's Cut contenuti caratteristiche aggiuntive rispetto release giapponese originale , grazie finanziatori kickstarter . Potete mettere giapponese premendo testo J tastiera , tornare italiano tasto I.fault serie romanzi Cinematografici fantascienza usa sistema telecamera 3D unico esperienza lettura visualmente immersiva , segue storia principessa chiamata Selphine Protettrice Reale Ritona . Quando assalto improvviso devasta terra natale Rughzenhaide , due costrette scappare ... qualche modo finiscono teleportate foresta ignota piena vegetazione riconoscono . L'aria densa pesante . Non ' segno vita , cosa piuttosto insolita foresta così rigogliosa . C ' qualcosa va terra ... troppo sorprese notarlo.Chi assaltatori qual'era obbiettivo ? Dove finite Selphine Ritona ? Riusciranno tornare casa sane salve ? E cosa importante , cosa stato patria ? Seguite Selphine , frizzante , allegra spensierata Principessa sveglia po misantropica Protettrice Reale Ritona , viaggio vita verso terra natale Rughzenhaide.Gli episodi fault definiti `` milestones '' ( pietre miliari ) programmati essere rilasciati periodicamente , creati ALICE IN DISSONANCE , portati Sekai Project.+ Hammerwatch Sviluppato : Crackshell Pubblicato : Crackshell Informazioni giocoA hack and slash action adventure , set fantasy pixel art environment . Play solo or co-op this adventure from bottom to top of Castle Hammerwatch . Europa Universalis IV : Call to Arms Pack includes : Europa Universalis IV : The Winged Hussars PackThe pack contains 12 unique cavalry models for the cavalry for Russia , Poland and Lithuania , three of the most influential eastern European states the Europa Universalis IV era.Europa Universalis IV : The National Monuments PackThis pack adds new graphical national monuments to the already stunning Europa Universalis IV map . The new map items are : The Cologne Cathedral , The Notre Dame cathedral , The Tower of London , The Old Faithful geyser , The Kremlin , Saint Peters Cathedral , Mount Fuji and the temple Angkor Wat.+ Dishonored : The Brigmore Witches Sviluppato : Arkane Studios Pubblicato : Bethesda Softworks Riguardo contenutoContinue your journey as the legendary assassin , Daud , inDishonored : The Brigmore Witches . Access Daud ’ s weapons , gadgets , allies and supernatural abilities once more , and bring his twisted narrative that began withThe Knife of Dunwallto close.After discovering the identity and intentions of Delilah , the leader of the Brigmore Witch coven , you set out to disrupt her from completing powerful ritual that will spell your doom . Having already been betrayed by your lieutenant , Billie Lurk , you must rely on feuding gang factions—the Dead Eels and the Hatters—to negotiate your way through previously unseen districts of Dunwall en route to Delilah ’ s stronghold . Regardless of the way you reach your destination , one thing is for certain – you will finally answer for your treacherous actions and fall before the mercy , or punishment , of the Royal Bodyguard and Assassin , Corvo Attano.Features : New Powers , Weapons and GadgetsThe mark of the Outsider empowers you with unique supernatural abilities . Quickly draw your enemies towards you and suspend them helplessly air or use them as human shield with ‘ Pull ’ . Call upon the Whalers to assist combat with ‘ Summon Assassin ’ and track down hidden Runes and Bone Charms with ‘ Void Gaze ’ . To aid your dangerous exploits your customized arsenal of weapons and gadgets will include Chokedust to daze your enemies , whale oil-powered Stun Mines to shock your targets , and concealed Wristbow to launch sleep darts and explosive bolts.Explore More of DunwallMake your way through Draper ’ s Ward and explore its streets , hazardous sewers and the two rival gangs ’ home bases : the textile mills and the boat docks . Revisit the rotting Coldridge Prison , which you must infiltrate order to free the dangerous but imprisoned leader of the Dead Eels gang . Finally , attack the gothic Brigmore Manor , where Delilah and her Brigmore Witches dwell and await your reckoning.Choose Your PathIn your quest to thwart Delilah ’ s plans , approach each mission with your own style . Your redemption – or your turn towards darkness – depends on your skills and the decisions you make . Determine your ultimate fate as you conclude Daud ’ s journey The Brigmore Witches.Persistent PlaythroughContinue your journey from The Knife of Dunwall through The Brigmore Witches the truest sense . Your power , weapon and item upgrades , Chaos level , and player actions from The Knife of Dunwall will carry over via compatible save file option.+ Europa Universalis IV Extreme Edition Sviluppato : Paradox Development Studio Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Informazioni giocoPorta termine dominazione globaleParadox Development Studio ritorna quarto episodio pluripremiata serie Europa Universalis . Pubblicato : Starbreeze Publishing AB Payday 2 PC sparatutto prima persona cooperativo successo gioco dipende , larga misura , compagni squadra . Il gioco ambientato Washington , due anni dopo eventi primo Payday , sequel ben fatto , mantiene meglio gioco originale migliora necessario.Informazioni giocoNel gioco , puoi scegliere pianificare condurre rapine solo massimo tre compagni squadra . Nel corso ogni operazione puoi rapinare banche , auto blindate negozi ogni tipo , oltre produrre distribuire stupefacenti . Se piace pensare fuori schemi , puoi persino partecipare elezioni qualcosa molto nicchia furto vendita testate nucleari contrabbando ! Personalizza aspetto scegliendo prima ventuno membri gang offerta poi apportando modifiche estetiche preferisci . Puoi rendere personaggio molto rispetto precedente incarnazione gioco , piuttosto limitata quell'area specifica.Il gunplay abbastanza semplice , offre peso piacevolmente autentico , laddove equipaggiamento consenta , ogni arma suona modo diverso , dando scontri fuoco certa realtà soddisfacente . Puoi quasi dire pistola viene utilizzata solo suono fucile alta potenza silenziatore meravigliosamente smorzato.Gli alberi abilità coinvolgenti vale pena investire tempo sforzi migliorare te stesso , poiché migliori abilità , divertenti missioni ! Furtivamente , funziona ! In versione , sparatutto bang-bang disapprovati . Gli sviluppatori lavorato molto meccaniche stealth ; gratificante coloro piace superare problemi punta piedi , possono , molti punti bonus giocatori furbi.Durante gioco , l'eccitazione aumentata altro livello cose inaspettate vanno storte.Anche piani meglio preparati possono essere annullati civile casuale passa momento sbagliato chiama polizia te , incendio scoppia fa scattare allarme , qualche altro evento emozionante richiede attenzione immediata urgente piano successo ! La missione , scegli accettarlaC ' bacheca casuale apre tanto tanto , offrendo varie missioni contratti.Se piace l'aspetto , dirigiti verso zona città sede contratto mettiti lavoro dando caccia bersaglio , persona , valore qualcos'altro.Se piace descrizione missione , ignorala cose finché arriva possa catturare immaginazione.Puoi scegliere giocare modalità giocatore singolo , desideri , gioco molto divertente partner vita reale rispode modo inventivo , scarso divertente , rendendo gameplay completamente unico ogni volta giochi.Poiché partner dell'IA modalità offline giocatore singolo privi personalità servono solo scopo proteggerti spari , multiplayer darà grande esperienza.Difficoltà scelta ( nome band ) Non ' modalità facile qui . Invece , sette designazioni suono esotico sembrano nome band ! Prendere troppi colpi perdere troppe forze andare custodia : livelli inferiori gioco , vieni rilasciato dopo trascorso tempo prestabilito , livelli alti potresti aver bisogno compagno squadra afferrare ostaggio contrattare scambiarti loro.NormaleDifficileMolto difficileEsageratoCaosDesiderio morteCondanna mortePayday 2 PC disponibile all'acquisto Instant Gaming piccolissima parte prezzo intero . Riceverai chiave ufficiale potrai giocare pochi secondi . Play smart . Giocherai attraverso tre diverse modalità gioco guadagnare ricompense fine salire livello progredire classifiche.Prima poter utilizzare qualsiasi veicolo , deve essere ricercato quindi acquistato . Gli acquisti vengono effettuati utilizzando valute gioco , puoi acquistare denaro reale accumulare.Tutte varie modalità gioco offrono eventi occasionali vanno ricreazione battaglie reali ( esempio , Battaglia d'Inghilterra ) eventi bizzarri convenzionali pesce d'aprile battaglie irrealistiche anno missili sparati patate carote serbatoi gomma gonfiabili ! Cose sapereCi due valute gioco : Leone d'Argento giorni rara Aquila reale . La maggior parte giocatori cava leoni d'argento vengono guadagnati durante gioco soprattutto quando vince battaglia ; aquile reali rare vengono salvate acquisti speciali , volta ogni tanto.L'intero gioco supportato musica marziale ispiratrice note corali , aiutano durante migliori sforzi nazione prescelta . Anche guidare volare buone esperienze gioco effetti visivi sbalorditivi . Tuttavia , pieno battaglia , noterai malapena meravigliosa luce dorata tramonto mentre combatti sopravvivere ! La modalità cooperativa quattro giocatori consente cameratismo gioco : invita amici unisciti sconosciuti pensano stesso modo . Oppure puoi unirti squadra , l'equivalente clan gioco . L'appartenenza squadra offre vari bonus ricompense membri dà accesso divertimento taglio spinta giochi multiplayer 8v8.Tutti veicoli gioco minuziosamente dettagliati , motori accurati , verniciatura realistica , velocità realistiche altri controlli . Sono stati tracciati modo molto accurato riguarda risposte all'essere colpiti danneggiati , quindi preparati fisica vita reale avere impatto veicolo quando preso mira ! Dettagli modalità giocoCi tre modalità gioco provare , ordine facile impegnativa : Battaglie Arcade : modalità semplice veloce , molti giocatori squadra potenza motore potenziata velocità spostamento torretta fluida . Le munizioni illimitate giocatori contrassegnati , quindi sai parte noBattaglie realistiche : battaglie ritmo lento rispetto battaglie Arcade potenza motore realistica/storica , velocità spostamento torretta , velocità salita virata ecc . Per battaglie terra , segnali identificano carri armati amici mentre puoi sparargli , puoi danneggiarli . Le nazioni tendono combattersi squadre tendono essere composte nazionalità combatte ’ altraBattaglie simulatore : lente battaglie realistiche senza giocatori contrassegnati , quindi fuoco amico ora diventa possibilità . Il POV visuale comandante terra alterna visuale cabina pilotaggio visuale dell'artigliere aria : ' visuale terza persona ampia modalità ! Questa modalità regolata modo rigoroso riguarda punti spawn , elenco curato veicoli scegliere , dando l'impressione essere modalità `` postazioni fisse '' piuttosto battaglia completamente casuale può fare vincere.Alcuni dettagli extra essere conoscenza : Battaglie Arcade , nazione scelta importanza , potresti finire combattere veicolo identico . Il sistema mira valuta potenziali colpi verde , giallo rosso seconda danni , così puoi fare colpi possano danneggiare veicolo . Gli aerei possono ricaricare mentre volo . I giocatori terra tre respawn mentre giocatori volo comunque molti rientri aerei ( esempio : dieci aerei - dieci respawn ) .Battaglie realistiche : battaglie terra , giocatori devono aver guadagnato abbastanza punti rigenerarsi , mentre nemici aerei possono usare aerei solo possesso , ricercato attrezzato , attesa hangar . Hanno solo spawn . Gli aerei devono atterrare riarmarsi svantaggi scelta battaglie aeree realistiche includono : surriscaldamento , velocità eccessiva , danni parti dell'aereo . Gli aerei usati scopi specifici : bombardamento basi terrestri combattimento aereo.In tutte modalità , gameplay può essere bello emozionante.+ Worms Clan Wars Sviluppato : Team17 Digital Ltd Pubblicato : Team17 Digital Ltd Informazioni giocoWorms™ Clan Wars un'esclusiva PC riscoprire amici famiglie nobile arte mettersi gioco , supremazia mondiale pecore esplosive.Worms™ Clan Wars migliore grande titolo Worms™ mai stato creato . I paesaggi estesi , l'acqua dinamica mai stati così tanti vermi , armi oggetti personalizzazione . Worms™ Clan Wars stato progettato trarre pieno vantaggio nuova generazione hardware PC : stupenda grafica 3D alta risoluzione ( senza tradire classiche meccaniche gioco 2D ) , effetti luce , nuove funzionalità facilitare l'interazione sociale fra utenti , sfiziose aggiunte migliorare l'esperienza singolo , quant'altro fan Worms possa desiderare.Forma clan , sfida mondoUnisciti amici altri giocatori Worms™ Clan Wars formare temibili squadre . Dai nome clan , creane l'emblema promuovi altri giocatori rango ufficiale capoclan . Iscrivi clan lega combattete fianco fianco lasciare segno classifiche . Del resto , serve teca trofei , vinci neanche ? Resta contatto amici , nemici , WormNet , sistema sala d'attesa chat esclusivo gioco . Ogni clan proprio canale chat , pure svariati canali soddisfare gusti ludici palati hardcore ! Fai salto online socializzare , chattare , arruolare nuovi membri trovare partite giuste.Inoltre , puoi connetterti gioco quando via , grazie all'applicazione portatile Worms Companion ( web , iOS Android ) . Il multigiocatore online Worms™ superato ! E gioco singolo menoLa modalità Storia sprizza imprevedibilità pori , debutto marchingegni regolati fisica . Una pletora macchinari ingegnosi ravvivano dinamiche gioco tramutano modalità giocatore singolo Worms™ vero spasso ! Ma modalità solo sinonimo morte distruzione , necessario districarsi fra ponti corda ingannevoli salvare alleati trappole mortali ! Così giocatore spenderà tempo giocare meno tempo aspettare ' I.A . nemica mossa.Datti fare Steam WorkshopTi reputi un'artista incompreso ? L'integrazione Steam Workshop permette scatenare creatività ! Così potrai far indossare vermi l'abbigliamento sempre desiderato . Come pure importare gioco oggetti 3D creazione grazie strumento parte . Potrai plasmare cappelli , occhiali , baffi , ninnoli lapidi vermi . Potrai persino progettare paesaggi modo ! E particolarmente orgoglioso creazioni , condividerle online ? Tutto grazie Steam Workshop ! Worms™ Clan Wars versione completa mai vista Worms™ ! Ovvero gioco fan hardcore bramano sempre.Novità : supporto clan.Novità : leghe clan multigiocatore.Novità : l'editor emblemi clan.Novità : l'applicazione Worms Companion iOS/Android/web.Novità : supporto Steam Workshop . Crea oggetti personalizzazione , progetta paesaggi poi condividi Steam Workshop.Novità : ciclo giorno/notte annessa transizione luce.Novità : marchingegni regolati fisica.Editor paesaggiOltre 200 oggetti unici personalizzazione vermi.65 armi oggetti utili , compresi 10 nuovi oltraggiosi oggetti : Mega mortaio , Becchino , Scimmia alata , Ossigeno , Wormuleto , Blitz bovino , Cuscino scorreggione , Pistola teletrasporto , Pacchetto Acqua l'Equalizzatore.4 classi vermi migliorate , comprese nuove abilità speciali.5 ambienti : Inca , Vichinghi , Giappone feudale , Rivoluzione industriale Preistoria.Modalità Deathmatch multigiocatore Fortini.25 missioni Storia giocatore singolo.10 missioni Sfida tempo `` Centro operativo '' .Paesaggi grandi 30 % ( mai così vasti ! ) .+ Cities Motion 2 : Metro Madness Sviluppato : Colossal Order Ltd. Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Ever wanted to have shorter metro for the night time , or very long version for the rush hour ? Well , now it 's possible ! The Metro Madness pack features customizable metro trains that you can put together car by car and alter the setup for different timetables . It also boasts five brand new metro trains ( each with three different cars ) and the possibility to place metro depots underground.Crescenta FL9 : The brand new model from the Crescenta factories , the FL9 , is future classic . It features very comfortable ride for the passengers and an impressive carrying capacity . It lacks speed but it makes up for it by carrying such huge amount of people . It is at its best on congested inner city routes.Galaxie Madressa : The Madressa might not be the quickest , but it has excellent fuel efficiency and high capacity . This modern vehicle performs well on busy routes.Capitol EcoBoost : It may have an otherworldly appearance , but do n't worry , it just the new EcoBoost made from recycled materials ! The Capitol Factories wanted something brand new and eco-friendly , so they used recycled material to build an new metro train model . The unique look is very attractive to passengers.Capitol Rocket : With extra wide seating the Rocket is superbly comfortable to ride . It 's also sturdy and needs little maintenance . It does n't consume lot of energy , but it 's not as fast as other trains . Comfort comes with cost ! Arnauld Metropolis : The Metropolis , as the name states , is designed for big , bustling cities . It barely needs maintenance thanks to the solid build , and is very fuel efficient . All this combined with high average speed means it is an excellent vehicle on busy inner city routes with passengers day long.+ Gone Home Sviluppato : Fullbright Pubblicato : Fullbright Informazioni gioco7 giugno 1995 . Ore 1:15Torni casa dopo aver viaggiato all'estero anno . Ti aspetti famiglia dia benvenuto , casa vuota . Dove ? E cosa successo ? Svela mistero Gone Home , gioco esplorazione storia The FullBright Company.Gone Home simulazione esplorazione interattiva . Studia ogni dettaglio casa ’ apparenza normale rivelare storia persone vivono . Apri ogni cassetto ogni porta . Raccogli oggetti esaminali far apparire indizi . Scopri eventi vita membri famiglia attraverso ’ osservazione lasciati spalle.Torna nuovo casa.Una storia personale : creata veterani serie BioShock team ’ origine storia Minerva ’ s Den , Gone Home sviluppa dettagli ricchi sfumati difficoltà famiglia incontra gestire ’ incertezza , patemi cambiamenti . Vincitore numerosi premi Gioco ’ anno , Migliore storia Miglior debutto GDC , BAFTA pubblicazioni PC Gamer , IGN , Polygon Paste.Un luogo immersivo : ritorna anni novanta visitando casa ogni dettaglio stato scrupolosamente ricreato suoni temporale scatena ’ esterno sentire parte integrante ’ esperienza.Nessun combattimento , nessun puzzle : Gone Home esperienza senza violenza priva rompicapo , invita giocare ritmi senza essere attaccato , incastrato irritato . Questa casa chiede solo essere esplorata.Un ’ inchiesta totalmente interattiva : scopri cosa accaduto Greenbriar esaminando casa piena oggetti personali note lettere lasciato . Usa capacità osservazione dare senso storia spiega mentre esplori.Una esperienza narrativa compatta : vorranno due ore quattro ore scoprire storia Sam Greenbriar segreti celano casa Arbor Hill . Quanto scoprirai dipenderà ’ intensità seguirai ogni piccolo indizio spazio denso ricco storia.Commentario dietro quinte : 90 minuti commentario sviluppatori , musicisti attori Gone Home . Accedi modalità Commentario clic pulsante Modificatori quando inizi nuova partita ! + Goodbye Deponia Premium Sviluppato : Daedalic Entertainment Pubblicato : Daedalic Entertainment Ancora caos , distruzione , Rufus . Ben tre Rufus scateneranno ogni tipo pandemonio commedia avventurosa point & click lungo attesa , Goodbye Deponia ! L'Organon pianifica distruzione Deponia , l'amabile Goal scomparso ( ancora volta ) sembra proprio l'anti-eroe Rufus continui averla vinta . Tutto ciò desiderava l'inventore spirito libero Rufus abbandonare pianeta Deponia trasferirsi Elysium , paradiso orbita attorno Deponia nave spaziale riservata ranghi elevati società . Goal , l'ex ragazza Elysian Rufus ancora follemente innamorato , sembra ancora essere chiave ricerca ... l'ascensore porterà spazio . Alla fine , Rufus escogitato piano perfetto . E bastasse , potenzialmente potuto andare storto all'improvviso prende davvero brutta piega . Rufus ritrova ( all'inizio mascherato ) crociera alto mare austeri ufficiali dell'Organon , mentre ' ancora traccia Goal . Quando Rufus imbatte macchina clonazione , crede aver trovato soluzione . Una copia clonata dovrebbe aiutarlo uscire difficile situazione . Ma errore inatteso `` inspiegabile '' causa complicazioni Goal sfugge nuovo mani eroe . Ora , deve risolvere tre problemi principali : Deve trovare nuovamente Goal , raggiungere l'Elysium evitare l'intero pianeta Deponia venga distrutto mano Organon . Tre problemi solo Rufus possono risolvere – perciò sfortunato inventore decide clonare stesso ! Questo porta alcune pazze diramazioni giocatore : In Goodbye Deponia , giocatore occasionalmente bisogno tenere sotto controllo tre Rufus , utilizzandoli insieme portare termine missioni – Rufus fa davvero meglio . Goodbye Deponia l'epica conclusione trilogia Deponia seguito miglior gioco tedesco 2013 ( German Computer Game Awards ) . La premiata serie Deponia include tre stravaganti serie avventurose provenienti pianeta Deponia . La trilogia classica point & click alletterà solo fan commedia veterani approccia prima volta genere avventura . Le serie umoristiche Deponia impressionano bellissima grafica tipica fumetti , disegnata mano 2D , dialoghi sarcastici buona dose black humor . Ha ricevuto numerosi premi , incluso premio German Computer Game Award ( Deutscher Computerspielpreis ) tanti altri premi altri sviluppatori tedeschi.Una classica avventura point & click mondo unico , scia tradizione Douglas Adams , Terry Pratchett Matt GroeningDai creatori Memoria , Edna & Harvey : The Breakout , A New Beginning Edna & Harvey : Harvey 's New EyesUna conclusione epica iconiche serie Deponia.Stile fumetti unico grafica disegnata mano HD 2DScene intermezzo musica piacevoli animazioni.+ Goodbye Deponia Sviluppato : Daedalic Entertainment Pubblicato : Daedalic Entertainment Informazioni giocoAncora caos , distruzione , Rufus . La meccanica gioco concentrata Divekick dimostra livello d ’ intensità singola mossa effettivamente possiede , presenta ( rinforza ) , abilità fondamentali genere : gioco mentale , spazio , coordinazione tempistica reattività immediata.Noi Iron Galaxy amiamo giochi combattimento . Quello fa divertire giocatore tipo , nascosto dietro serie infinita combinazioni input memorizzare . Ecco Divekick solo due pulsanti : Tuffarsi ( ’ aria ) fa saltare personaggio verso ’ alto . Calciare permette personaggio saltare piedi pari verso basso . Se premi Calcia quando terra , puoi saltare via avversario . Utilizzando mosse , vincerai round primo colpo , giocatore totalizza cinque round vinti , vince partita . Si tratta adrenalina pura , consapevolezza vincere nemico ’ astuzia.Funzionalità chiave14+ personaggi assolutamente unici , ciascuno quali stile proprio combattimento tecniche speciali .
