Otterrai Criminal Enterprise Starter Pack , soluzione migliore partire piede giusto Grand Theft Auto Online.GRAND THEFT AUTO VUn giovane truffatore , rapinatore banche pensione spaventoso psicopatico costretti serie difficoltà mettere atto serie audaci colpi città possono fidarsi nessuno , men meno l'uno dell'altro.GRAND THEFT AUTO ONLINEScopri universo continua evoluzione possibilità modi giocare mentre carriera mondo criminale Los Santos Blaine County mondo Online definitivo.CRIMINAL ENTERPRISE STARTER PACKIl Criminal Enterprise Starter Pack scorciatoia migliore appena iniziato cimentarsi GTA Online vuole avviare meglio impero crimine , usufruendo fin subito contenuti popolari eccitanti valore oltre 10.000.000 GTA $ 1.000.000 GTA $ omaggio spendere liberamente all'interno gioco.COSTRUISCI IL TUO IMPERO DEL CRIMINEComanda impero economico ufficio Maze Bank ovest , ricerca armi devastanti bunker sotterraneo Traffico d'armi usa fabbrica banconote contraffatte farti strada mondo falsari.UNA FLOTTA DI SPLENDIDI VEICOLIDomina strade 10 veicoli alte prestazioni , supercar , serie motociclette , Dune FAV armato , elicottero , un'auto rally altri ancora . Riceverai serie proprietà , garage 10 posti custodire gioiellini.ARMI , ABBIGLIAMENTO E TATUAGGIAvrai disposizione lanciagranate compatto , fucile tiratore fucile compatto , oltre Completi racing , tatuaggi motociclista altro ancora.+ Grand Theft Auto V : Premium Online Edition Sviluppato : Rockstar North Pubblicato : Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto V : Premium Online Edition include : - l'esperienza completa storia Grand Theft Auto V , mondo costante evoluzione Grand Theft Auto Online , miglioramenti gameplay contenuti fino oggi Doomsday Hit , traffico armi , Smuggler 's Run , Bikers altro ancora.È incluso Criminal Enterprise Starter Pack , modo veloce potenziare imperi criminali nuovi giocatori GTA Online contenuti eccitanti popolari , bonus 1.000.000 dollari spendere GTA Online . Il valore oltre 10.000.000.000 dollari GTA $ .Grand Theft Auto V : L'Edizione Premium Online PC stata lanciata insieme versione giocatore singolo gioco . L'impresa ambiziosa , primo momento gioco stato oggetto molte lamentele problemi giocabilità , perdita dati serie altri difetti . Tuttavia , sviluppatori modo lavorare lanciare subito aggiornamenti patch risolto problemi , oltre offrire missioni gameplay.Informazioni giocoNella versione giocatore singolo giocoGrand Theft Auto V , personaggi legati trama lineare viene elaborata modo abbastanza diretto . Questo caso versione online offre libertà – volte può tradursi maggiore complessità – esplorare scegliere quali missioni desidera completare , piuttosto dover smarcare propria strada attraverso scenari.L'ambientazione online stessa versione giocatore singolo , città immaginarie San Andreas Los Santos sede contea Blaine , complete mondo completamente realizzato sacco attività provare edifici strade esplorare.La versione online gioco consente massimo 30 giocatori giocare modo cooperativo competitivo , combattendo insieme altri nemici , oppure l'uno l'altro supremazia breve termine . Puoi unirti equipaggi comprendono sconosciuti collaborare amici creando equipaggio chiuso.Nessun problema lagDal momento così tante persone accedono server contemporaneamente , potrebbe aspettare qualche ritardo lag mentre accedono preparano giocare . In realtà , l'accesso rapido semplice lag sembrano essere molto rari , piacevole sorpresa , data quantità dati grezzi trasmessi ciascun giocatore ! Naturalmente , necessario disporre banda larga alta velocità computer gioco qualità relativamente buona ottenere migliore esperienza gioco.Al primo accesso , personaggio giocatore viene raccolto aeroporto dotato veicolo un'arma . Poi ' tutorial un'ora consigliamo seguire fornisce molti consigli utili esplorare mondo , unirsi squadre equipaggi sfruttare meglio l'esperienza gioco.Così tanto fare ! La maggior parte giochi multiplayer limite numero totale giocatori , vengono raggruppati percorsi preimpostati trame . Non . Questo fondamentalmente enorme mondo aperto compagni squadra potete vagare ovunque immaginaria Contea Blaine esplorando edifici caratteristiche combattendo strada armi.I giocatori possono scegliere : Esegui tiro volante folla nemiciEsegui volo radente rubando aereo quindi conducendo ciò equivale passaggio aereoRapine - rapine normali ! Le rapine gioco richiedono compagni squadra seguono fasi , pertanto necessaria un'attenta pianificazione assicurarsi requisiti fase soddisfatti affinché rapina successoPartite mortali : combatti partite mortali finché sopravvivrai solo , re mondo ! Lavora compagni squadra portare termine missioni troppo difficili sola personaGareggia amici nemici gare terra , aeree marittime usando veicoli puoi trovare acquisire corso gioco.Grand Theft Auto V : Edizione Premium Online PC disponibile all'acquisto Instant Gaming piccolissima parte prezzo dettaglio . Riceverai chiave potrai giocare pochi secondi . Play smart . Pay less.+ Mortal Kombat X Sviluppato : NetherRealm Studios QLOC Pubblicato : Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment Informazioni gioco '' Avanti prossimo ! Assapora nuova generazione saga combattimento numero 1.Mortal Kombat X combina animazioni cinematografiche uniche nuovo stile gioco . Per prima volta , potrai scegliere diverse varianti ogni personaggio , influenzeranno strategie stili combattimento.Il leggendario Goro viene offerto bonus preordini . `` 370 giocatori giocando ora Steam+ Age of Wonders III - Eternal Lords Expansion ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Triumph Studios Pubblicato : Triumph Studios Riguardo contenutoEternal Lords is the major , second expansion for the acclaimed strategy game Age of Wonders III , marking one year of continuous development since its release . With the introduction of the Tigran and Frostling races and the new Necromancer class , players must adapt to world on the brink of cataclysmic change . New features such as the Race Governance system , which allows players to tailor features of each race their empire to meet their strategic needs , add new layers of depth to empire development and diplomacy . Embrace the forbidden powers and reign for eternity ! Eternal Lords Content Includes : The Necromancer Player Class : The Necromancer ’ s legions march to establish an eternal kingdom , unifying the world ’ s races death . The Necromancer creates spectacular undead units , such as the Bone Collector , crablike monstrosity which eats corpses to strengthen itself . Other units are summoned , such as the Banshee , which invokes despair the hearts of the living . The Necromancer ’ s dark magic allows players to convert towns to cities of the dead , filled obedient Ghoul minions.Torch Bearers , Grey Guard and Shadow Born Leader Specializations : These Champions of Good , Neutrality and Evil respectively deepen the alignment mechanics and provide players of classes powers to withstand the challenges of the new age . Learn spells to summon mighty Angels , end game units who embody the essence of each alignment.Frostling Player Race : Frostlings are race of humanoids that emerged from the frozen north . Lead by their Ice Queens , they embark on frequent raids warmer lands . Their seafaring skills , offensive fighting style and frost magic spread fear among the coastline villages they pillage . Frostings are even more deadly their home arctic clime , where they build cities carved into the very glaciers they hope will someday grow to cover the earth.Tigran Player Race : These feline humanoids hail from remote desert lands . They worship the sun and track the cycle of day and night ; life and death . Their natural curiosity about necromancy and the passing of regal souls into kingdoms of glory the afterlife inspires them to construct massive tombs . Tigrans are natural sprinters , capable of moving far faster combat than members of the other races , and are familiar with shape changing magic , allowing their mystics to transform into Dire Panthers.Eternal Lords Story Campaign . An epic battle of the forces of creation : fire versus ice , life versus death . As Arvik , heir to broken Frostling kingdom , you awaken forbidden necromantic powers to reclaim your realm . You will find unlikely allies , and must choose between your Frostling roots or the full potential of your new found powers.Cosmic Happenings : The dawn of the Eternal Lords has triggered cataclysmic events that can radically shift fortunes . These events occur as the game progresses , disrupting the best laid plans and providing opportunities for cunning players to gain an advantage . Falling Clouds can fill the world with mist , giving shock weakness to machine and armored units and reducing sight range , while the March of the Troll King can cause armies of trolls to rampage across the map.Race Governance : Relations are now tracked race , allowing you to make careful decisions who to make war with . Declaring war on an Elven city might give you quick conquest , but don ’ t expect your Elven citizens to be happy about it afterwards ! As your relations with each race improve , you will be able to earn unique racial perks that boost your armies and economy.Unifier Victory Condition.When reaching maximum Governance for Race , the production of Unity Beacon is unlocked cities of that race . Building Unity Beacons for the number of races set the victory condition , makes you the Great Unifier and wins the gameA dozen Mysterious Map Locations : Capture the Reef Colony Dwelling , home to horrors of the deep , and discover new treasure sites such as the Lich ’ s Castle , Temple of the Sands and the Hall of the Forefathers to benefit your empire.Plus New Hero Items , Standalone Scenarios and more ! Eternal Lords incorporates feedback from the community and coincides with free update adding : Play by Email `` a-synch '' Multiplayer Mode : which lets you play Age of Wonders III when you want . You get an email notification when it ’ s your turn , boot the game and Triumph ’ s server automatically sends and receives your game data for you.New content and features are integrated into the updated Random Map Generator.+ Grand Theft Auto V Sviluppato : Rockstar North Pubblicato : Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto V PC gioco avventura azione , quinto serie GTA . Come altri giochi serie , ottieni punti commettendo crimini . Il gioco alterna narrazione terza persona gioco prima persona , giochi tre criminali cercano evitare determinata agenzia governativa commettere rapine . Non dovrai scegliere solo personaggio giocare , narrazione gioco passa personaggio all'altro.Informazioni giocoIl gioco ambientato città immaginaria San Andreas basa vagamente vita generica California sud . Mentre maggior parte gioco svolge città , mondo molto ampio precedenti offerte GTA giocatori possono esplorare liberamente . La città trova contea Blaine , vicino un'altra città , Los Santos ( entrambe immaginarie ) tutte aree accessibili dall'inizio gioco.Città completamente operative ! Tuttavia , alcuni gameplay devono essere sbloccati nell'area mappa aperta , prima poter assaporare completamente ciò offre gioco.Ma vale pena esplorare oppure missioni lineari : Los Santos vanta campo golf completamente operativo , campi tennis , può andare gare - ' mercato azionario possibile guardare fluttuazioni . Le sale cinematografiche consentono guardare film vuoi po ’ riposo , oppure aiuti rapinare ( salvare dall'essere rapinato ) ignaro passante , puoi raccogliere veicoli persino rapinare furgone corazzato - qualunque cosa voglia quando gioco presenta situazione ! La storia incentrata sull'azione rapina sacco scenari tiro guida mantenere giocatori impegnati interessati . I giocatori usano attacchi corpo corpo , esplosioni armi fuoco sconfiggere nemici possono guidare , nuotare , correre saltare muoversi mondo . Esplorando mondo ampio , può rubare aerei sorvolare terreno ridurre tempi viaggio.Il gioco molto coinvolgente , quasi film interattivo piuttosto gioco , azioni intervallate molte conversazioni guida scene collegamento guardare mentre aspetti prossima opportunità colpire banca commettere rapina.Se vuoi finire fresco…Le azioni criminali renderanno obiettivo molti , quindi tienilo mente quando rispetti legge ! Peggiore crimine commetti , alto lista `` ricercati '' influisce aggressivamente forze dell'ordine comporteranno confronti quando raggiungeranno . Se ! Crea lungometraggio ! La modalità Director nuova caratteristica versione GTA , consente esplorare mondo qualsiasi personaggio occhio artistico , creativo . Puoi registrare pezzi filmati , poi tagliarli modificarli cortometraggio , puoi fare ancora mentre segui l'arco narrativo gioco , mentre esplori dentro intorno contea Blaine . Ulteriori informazioni modalità Director qui sotto.Sii spontaneo : puoi acquistare veicolo fare irruzione aeroporto fare impennate pista , solo trovare aereo facilmente accessibile puoi salire volare via altrove un'avventura completamente inaspettata ! Modalità giocoGiocatore singolo : giocatori devono completare missioni lineari fine andare avanti gioco , questione scelta individuale saltare attraverso livelli sbloccare tutte aree aggiornamenti piacevole esplorazione mondo aperto successivamente , vuole prendere tempo esplorare risorse aree man mano sbloccano assaporare viaggio attraverso gioco.Multiplayer : un'offerta online enorme possono partecipare fino trenta giocatoriGrand Theft Auto V Premium Online EditionModalità Director : già detto sopra , modalità gioco consente creare film . Puoi optare montaggi divertenti : scivoloni , viaggi primi piani colpi d'azione , oppure uscire Spielberg ' te utilizza l'intera gamma strumenti modifica taglio creare filmati alta qualità.Il gioco caratterizzato squisita attenzione dettagli , sacchetti immondizia sporcano vicoli periferici splendore tramonto catturato occhiali sole personaggio - nulla lasciato caso può essere mostrato buoni risultati film . Gli altri personaggi modalità Avventura disponibili contenuto scaricabile acquistabile separatamente . * The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.+ Convoy Sviluppato : Convoy Games Pubblicato : Indietopia Games Informazioni giocoConvoy is tactical roguelike-like inspired by Mad Max and FTL which you cross wasteland search of parts for your broken ship.Presented pixel art and set future post-apocalyptic setting , Convoy is squad based tactical roguelike-like its core . You travel with your combat vehicles and convoy across wasteland to find parts needed to repair your broken spaceship . During your journey you will encounter strangers randomized scenarios by picking up radio signals.Depending on the choices you make , signals can either lead to tactical combat , text based dialogue or chance based role-play . Whatever choice you make , you need to keep your convoy and its cargo safe from raiders , privateers and other enemies . Keep upgrading your vehicles , as death is permanent Convoy.FeaturesA new take on tactical combat : Combat plays out real time as high-speed car chase where you need to position your units and use abilities to maximise their effectiveness.Exploration pays : You will encounter many different radio signals , each with text based event . What doesn ’ t kill you may reward you with loot.Fully customizable units : Each unit can be upgraded and outfitted with different weapons and abilities , allowing you to customize them to your needs.A randomized planet : Each play-through features different main and side objectives , events , choices , and different consequences to your actions.A cold war turning hot : Three factions vie for control over the planet , your actions tip the scales of balance making you an enemy to everyone . As each faction grows strength , you need to keep up.Permadeath at the core : Knowing one wrong move could lead to certain death puts you constantly on edge.+ The Evil Within - The Consequence ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Tango Gameworks Pubblicato : Bethesda Softworks Riguardo contenutoProva l'emozione survival horror nuova prospettiva The Evil Within : The Consequence . Muoviti silenzio , infiltrati maniera furtiva nasconditi farti scoprire . Inganna nemici fischi travestimenti . Pubblicato : rondomedia GmbH Informazioni giocoDiventa l'eroe via rullaggio vesti panni dipendente aeroportuale Airport Simulator 2015.Prova tante appassionanti attività campo gestione aeromobili grande aeroporto internazionale prendi controllo trattori aerei , veicoli de-icing molto altro ancora ! Airport Simulator 2015 offre totale cinque famosi aerei 14 veicoli diversi , un'ampia varietà attività piazzale via rullaggio.Il lavoro può fermarsi , giorno notte , pioggia sole . Ricorda minimo ritardo voli costerà parecchio denaro.Assicurati aerei vengano riforniti passeggeri salgano bordo , mentre occupi catering trasporto carico bagagli . Porta aerei posizioni parcheggio l'aiuto dell'auto pista mettiti volante navetta trasporto passeggeri . Guida generatore semovente punto serve , prepara veicolo-passerella passerella molto altro ancora . Quando freddo fa intenso , dovrai mettere prova abilità rimuovere ghiaccio neve . Airport Simulator 2015 un'intera flotta veicoli.Se veicoli raggiungono limite possibilità , puoi potenziarli molti modi nell'hangar veicoli . È l'unico modo restare passo richieste sempre complesse rispettare tempi pressanti gestione aerei , sbloccando tanti obiettivi po ' abilità.Caratteristiche : Continua l'appassionante serie simulatori gestione aeroporto aeromobiliUn grandissimo ambiente aeroportuale open-world vie rullaggio piste atterraggio , hangar veicoli accesso torre controlloUn totale 14 veicoli macchine manovrare , na-vetta , veicolo-passerella , passerella , veicolo pushback , veicolo catering , caricatore , trasportatore carico , veicolo rifornimento , veicolo de-icing , generatore se-movente , auto pista tre diversi spazzaneveIl sistema dinamico missioni offre innumerevoli attivi-tà appassionanti piazzale via rullaggioUn totale cinque diversi tipi aereoTraffico aereo strada realistico ( compresi decolli atter-raggi ) Diversi obiettivi possibilità potenziare veicoli mac-chinariLe disparate condizioni meteo , neve , pioggia sole cicli giorno-notteAmbiente sonoro realistico , comprese comunicazioni radio+ Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Gold Edition Sviluppato : Red Dot Games Pubblicato : PlayWay S.A. In Dungeons 2 dovrai soddisfare ’ insaziabile sete vendetta Signore Dungeon , reclutando nuovi spaventosi mostri ogni angolo Sottomondo assecondare malvagie richieste . Conquistare Sottomondo , però , abbastanza : stavolta Signore Dungeon vuole estendere proprio dominio quei debolucci umani provare conquistare Sopramondo ! Vesti panni potente Signore Dungeon crea rete dungeon straordinari terrificanti , reclutando esercito spaventevoli creature gestendo due nuove fazioni . Preparati difendere Regno quei fastidiosi eroi , sali Sopramondo fare guerra città usa ” Mano terrore ” spostare direttamente seguaci , dare ordini persino rifilare bel ceffone , mettono riga.La lunga modalità Campagna ricca humor nero portato successo Dungeons originale condita numerosi riferimenti libri , film spettacoli televisivi mondo fantasy . Inoltre , puoi mettere prova forza quattro diverse modalità gioco multigiocatore , potranno divertirsi rete locale online fino quattro giocatori contemporanea sfidare altri Signori Dungeon.Caratteristiche Dungeons 2 : Con ’ emozionante campagna giocatore singolo 2 fazioni giocabili , 26 creature diverse , tantissimi tipi eroe modalità gioco , Dungeons 2 gioco simulazione gestione Dungeon aspettandoDungeons 2 offre gameplay davvero straordinario : Sottomondo , simulazione gestione dungeon ; Sopramondo , strategia tattica tempo realeGrazie `` Mano terrore ” puoi sempre prendere mano subordinati dare ordini precisi direttiEsci ’ oscurità Sottomondo avventurarti Sopramondo distruggere bellissime città umaniQuattro modalità multigiocatore competitive far divertire fino quattro giocatori rete locale tramite Internet+ Kerbal Space Program Sviluppato : Squad Pubblicato : Private Division Kerbal Space Program PC gioco simulazione volo spaziale utilizza motori fisici realistici formulazioni ingegneristiche precise rendono difficile lanciare razzo , rendono estremamente gratificante applichi formule teoriche realtà design vedi funzionano esattamente previsto.Il gioco così ben progettato persone lavorano settore spaziale , giganti spazio , NASA , mostrato interesse sviluppo.Informazioni giocoAmbientato pianeta immaginario chiamato Kerbin , alieni cartone animato , Kerbals , dimostrato straordinaria competenza progettazione veicoli spaziali volo interplanetario . I giocatori lavorano Kerbals progettare razzo , rover , aereo navicella spaziale funzionanti utilizzando numero componenti impostato.Una volta veicolo completo , puoi iniziare testarlo , iniziando lancio . Il lancio andrà storto fatto minimo errore progettazione calcolo : puoi riuscire liberarti dall'atmosfera , avere razzo troppo pesante design troppo esplosivo , può funzionare perfettamente : tranne corto carburante prima poter fare atterraggio sicuro rischi vedere frutto lavoro schiantarsi cadendo spirale terra.A causa difficoltà ottenere giusta tecnica , semplice raggiungimento ciò maggior parte altri giochi solo l'inizio , prima possa iniziare l'avventura `` vera '' , vale dire atterraggio successo navicella spaziale recente costruzione , può sembrare vera conquista . Come , effetti , ! L'intera premessa gioco costruzione volo astronavi razzi spazio , semplice descrizione sminuisce vasto dispendio sforzi serve ottenere modo giusto.Se ciò suona po ' preoccupante , farti prendere panico : ' approfondito tutorial stato ampliato migliorato rispetto versione iniziale gioco muovere primi piccoli passi verso costruzione missili . Il tutorial semplifica esattamente gioco , semplifica strada ! Tre modalità giocoSandbox : Con budget illimitato , pieno accesso tutte parti nave edificio assemblaggio veicolo fa clic selezionare parte nuovamente click posizionarla desideri . Ripeti l'operazione finché ritieni razzo ( altro veicolo scelta ) completo , quindi clic Avvia provarlo . Da lì , mondo casa : puoi esplorare lune vicine , pianeti lontani tornare laboratorio costruire un'altra nave sperimentale razzo ! Scienza : Con modalità , limitato termini budget risorse devi sviluppare abilità pur restando entro limiti . È modo divertente testare ingegnosità : vedere creare razzo grande , migliore funzionale puoi senza andare oltre budget gestire tempo condurre esperimenti guadagnare credito scientifico espandere po ' risorse guadagniCarriera : Questa versione gioco ruolo devi gestire solo scienza dipendenti spese generali . È necessario completare contratti ( missioni ) guadagnare punti reputazione . Avere buona reputazione porterà po ' soldi contratti.Mentre lavori nell'ambito contratti , puoi ignorare l'edificio necessita aggiornamenti : completarli lavorare , così viaKerbal Space Program PC disponibile all'acquisto Instant Gaming piccolissima parte prezzo dettaglio . Pay less.3694 giocatori giocando ora Steam+ Battle Brothers Sviluppato : Overhype Studios Pubblicato : Overhype Studios Informazioni giocoBattle Brothers is turn based tactical RPG which has you leading mercenary company gritty , low-power , medieval fantasy world . You decide where to go , whom to hire or to fight , what contracts to take and how to train and equip your men procedurally generated open world campaign . Do you have what it takes to lead them through bloody battles and to victory ? The game consists of strategic worldmap and tactical combat layer . On the worldmap you can freely travel order to take contracts that earn you good coin , find places worth looting , enemies worth pursuing or towns to resupply and hire men at . This is also where you manage , level up and equip your Battle Brothers . Once you engage hostile party the game will switch to tactical map where the actual fighting takes place as detailed turn based combat.Manage medieval mercenary company procedurally generated open world.Fight complex turn-based tactical battles with historical equipment and brutal injuries.Permadeath . All characters that die combat will stay dead – unless they return as the undead.All characters with their own background stories and traits . Want stuttering ratcatcher , greedy witch hunter or drunkard disowned noble ? Character development without restrictive class-system . Each character gains experience through combat , can level up and acquire powerful perks.Equipment that matters . Different weapons grant unique skills – split shields with axes , stun enemies with maces , form spearwall with spears or crush armor with warhammer.Diverse enemy roster . All enemies have unique equipment , skills and AI behavior.A dynamic event system with atmospheric encounters and tough decisions outside of combat.Three late game crises – war between noble houses , greenskin invasion and an undead scourge – add looming threat.Two full hours of orchestral soundtrack.70 Steam Achievements and Steam Trading Cards.Overhype Studios is an independent game developer studio from Hamburg , Germany . We are devoted to making great games that we want to play ourselves . With Battle Brothers we strive to reflect the creativity , complexity and originality from the old days when game developers were passionate gamers , not corporate businessmen . While doing this we took lot of inspiration from some of the best games out there : The original X-Com , Warhammer : Shadow of the Horned Rat and Jagged Alliance.1588 giocatori giocando ora Steam+ The Golf Club ( Collector 's Edition ) Sviluppato : HB Studios Pubblicato : HB Studios Riguardo contenutoThe Golf Club Collector 's Edition Upgrade brings the new Season Mode , Tropical Theme and host of improvements to the award-winning game.+ Verdun Sviluppato : M2H Blackmill Games Pubblicato : M2H Informazioni giocoVerdun primo sparatutto multiplayer prima persona ambientato ricostruzione realistica scenario Prima Guerra Mondiale . La spietata guerra trincea offre un'esperienza battaglia unica , trascina te squadra intense battaglie attacco difesa.Il gioco svolge fronte occidentale fra 1914 1918 , conflitti sanguinosi storia mondiale . Gli sviluppatori ispirati famigerata Battaglia Verdun 1916 . Sono presenti 4 distinte modalità gioco : Linee fronte , Logoramento , Scontro mortale fucile Difesa plotone . Sono inoltre presenti molti elementi storicamente accurati , armi realistiche prima Guerra Mondiale , uniformi autentiche , spargimenti sangue mappe basate veri campi battaglia Francia Belgio.La modalità Linee fronte unica grazia complessità tattica . Nelle trincee , ricreate massimo realismo , difficile combattere , catturarle difenderle , necessaria certa astuzia tattica . L'Intesa Potenze Centrali ogni sforzo possibile ottenere controllo settori fronte . In battaglia troverai correre verso trincee nemiche durante un'azione offensiva guadagnare terreno , mentre un'altra potresti trovarti difendere terreno appena conquistato potente contrattacco nemico.Ogni giocatore può scegliere far parte numerosi tipi squadra presenti gioco , ognuna quali proprio ruolo strategico . Collaborando amici , puoi guadagnare esperienza aumenta potenza versatilità squadra . Guadagnando esperienza grazie combattimenti salendo grado , puoi guadagnare Punti Carriera puoi usare sbloccare specializzazioni , armi equipaggiamento.Nella modalità Logoramento , l'Intesa Potenze Centrali fronte all'altra battaglia singola . A ognuna due parti assegnato numero rappresenta quantità uomini disponibili . Quando giocatore viene ucciso rientra gioco , numero diminuisce un'unità . Quando due parti arriva zero , giocatori rientrano dopo essere stati uccisi rimane ultimo uomini vince ! Lo Scontro mortale fucile modalità combattimento giocatori scontrano fra elettrizzante sfida abilità possono usare solo fucili.Nella modalità Difesa plotone , giocatore tre compagni devono difendere posizione lungo possibile infinite ondate aggressori controllati dall'IA.Caratteristiche principali Verdun : •Realismo Prima Guerra Mondiale : armi autentiche fisica realistica proiettili , uso armi basate abilità , sangue , gas velenoso claustrofobiche maschere gas , spargimenti sangue sbarramenti d'artiglieria.•Sparatutto prima persona tattico squadra : sistema unico aumento livello squadra , tipi squadra ruolo diversi , chat vocale , •Guerra trincea realistica : dinamiche fronte tempo reale attacchi contrattacchi basati slancio.•Ambientazione autentica Prima Guerra Mondiale : stile musica tipici Prima Guerra Mondiale , campi battaglia storici fronte Occidentale.•Modalità gioco impegnative : Linee fronte gioco squadra , Logoramento strategia , Scontro mortale fucile abilità Difesa plotone sopravvivenza disperata.REALISMO DELLA PRIMA GUERRA MONDIALEIl gioco coinvolgente crudo possibile grazie spargimenti sangue realistici ritraggono orrori campo battaglia Prima Guerra Mondiale . Ovviamente , caratteristica può essere disabilitata . Le armi , ricreate massima autenticità , devono essere maneggiate abilità , visto ognuna diversa puntatori aiutano mirare . Inoltre , fisica realistica proiettili obbliga pensare traiettoria , quando spari bersaglio movimento lunga distanza . In caso attacco gas , devi indossare maschera , compromette visuale offre un'esperienza davvero claustrofobica . E essere colpito pallottole essere gassato abbastanza , improvvisi sbarramenti d'artiglieria chiamati Sottufficiali potrebbero bloccarti campo aperto annientare squadra . La guerra perdona adatta deboli cuore ! SPARATUTTO IN PRIMA PERSONA TATTICO DI SQUADRAIl gioco squadra base Verdun . Quando inizi partita , prima cosa scegliere combattere l'Intesa Potenze Centrali . Con tre amici , puoi formare diverse squadre disponibili ognuna due parti . Ogni squadra tattica specifica basata unità dell'epoca . A seconda tipo squadra , giocatori possono scegliere ruolo specifico interno , tanto abbigliamento , armi abilità speciali storicamente accurati . Più esperienza compagni guadagnerete modalità cooperativa , squadra diventerà potente migliori abilità sbloccate . Questo progresso mostrato graficamente grazie uniformi sempre sofisticate . Guadagnerai Punti Carriera , possono essere utilizzati sbloccare specializzazioni , armi equipaggiamento.GUERRA IN TRINCEA REALISTICALa vera esperienza campo battaglia Prima Guerra Mondiale stata resa linea fronte gestita dinamicamente tempo reale , ubicata celebri luoghi fronte occidentale ricreati accuratezza storica . Queste mappe composte molti settori possono essere catturati ognuna due parti . Rimanendo fedeli guerra logoramento dell'epoca , entrambe fazioni attaccano contrattaccano turno , obbligandoti difendere trincee ogni settore catturato ! AMBIENTAZIONE AUTENTICA DELLA PRIMA GUERRA MONDIALEIl team sviluppo svolto vaste ricerche campo Verdun stato coadiuvato esperti storiografi garantire l'accuratezza Verdun . Le uniformi state ricreate fin piccolo dettaglio , armi modellate base reali mappe utilizzano elementi conformazioni terreno realistici Prima Guerra Mondiale . Tutto resto gioco , inoltre , stato progettato ricreare l'atmosfera cupa tipica Prima Guerra Mondiale : cieli nuvolosi tetri , un'interfaccia coinvolgente suoni realistici , voci naturali daranno sensazione trovarti trincea , ricoperto fango , scruti l'orizzonte imbracciando fucile cerchi avvistare nemico.+ WWE 2K15 Sviluppato : Pubblicato : WWE 2K15è ’ inizio nuova giochi WWE ! Blending X-Com style gameplay with RPG elements the unique Shadowrun setting and adding an extensive single- and co-op campaign , Shadowrun Chronicles offers the next generation of tactical turn based action games.Entrapped city plagued by deadly virus , assaulted by the minions of megacorporation , attacked by infected and with dragon on rampage through the city you have to unearth the secret conspiracy that connects it all.As the leader of your team of Shadowrunners , you will have to use magic , technology and every weapon available to you , to save the lives of thousands city at the brink of extinction . Grow you character , plan your missions and control your team combat or play live co-op with other players to overcome the challenges ahead of you . Meet your fellow runners the Back Alley or hire henchmen to help you succeed.Set the dystopian near future of our world , where magic has awakened and blends with technology , creatures of myth and legend have returned . Elves , Dwarves , Orks and Trolls walk among the neon-lit streets , while the matrix connects everyone and everything as the corporate towers cast their long shadows across the globe . You are Shadowrunner - secret operative on the edge of society , hired for the jobs no one wants to be connected with . A cyberpunk rebel surviving by skill and instinct the shadows of the corporate towers ! Welcome to the dark side of the future , chummer . It ’ s going to be hell of ride.Word of warning : The game is tough - it 's designed that way.Running the shadows is never easy and going guns blazing will certainly get you trouble ! Run and Gun ! Gripping and deadly tactical turn-based combat true Shadowrun style : Choose from wide array of skills groups , magic , technology and weapons to survive ! Teamwork ! Build up your team of runners or join with other players live co-op to find the best combination of skill , magic and technology for survival.You 'll never run alone ! Team up with friends for your next run or swap stories with other runners the hangout . Take other player 's characters with you into mission as henchmenEvery move counts ! Dive behind cover , find alternate routes with clever use of your skills , send your drones or spirits into battle and use any weapon at your disposal to make it out alive.Be who YOU want to be ! Create your individual Shadowrunner completely level-free character system from over 60 different combat and non-combat skills , unique backgrounds and five metahuman races . Start muscle-packed former Troll bouncer and become an expert Rigger , sending your drones into combat or complement your spell slinging mage with the abilities of skillful sniper . The choice is yours ! Gear up ! Employ variety of armor , augmentations , cyberware , magic and of course tons of weapons ! Lob grenade at your enemies , blast them with mana ball or pass them unnoticed by hacking their security systems . Over 50 different enemies from vicious gangers to combat drones and corporate wagemages await ! Shape the future ! Developed jointly with the tabletop RPG books your actions the game will shape the future of the whole Shadowrun universe ! Against swarms of vicious , demonic avatars , your only defenses are the gems you conjure that , when placed atop towers or into traps and amplifiers , become conduits for powerful magical and elemental attacks . GemCraft combines fast-paced real-time strategy as you deal with waves of incoming monsters , and cunning tactics that allow you to craft and combine magical gems.Create traps that poison or slow , discover powerful artifacts and unlock new abilities , and stand alone against The Forgotten , seemingly unkillable archdemon whose endless armies threaten to swallow the world . GemCraft is packed with multiple levels of difficulty , hundreds of achievements , nearly two hundred levels , and much , much more , making it rewarding , deep strategy game you 'll back to over and over again.Key Features : Conquer over 190 stages with unique challenges and conditions.Over two dozen passive skills to unlock and enhance as you level up and increase your power.More than 400 achievements that will reward you with more skill points as you earn them.Craft and combine nine gem types with different effects to suit your tactical needs.Combine and stack multiple tiers of difficulty and challenging battle traits for greater rewards , but also greater dangers.Socket fragments you find into your mystical talisman to impart new bonuses.Wield devastating spells to decimate your foes or enhance your gems.Control the speed of battle with fast-forward or pause to fit your play style.Want more monsters ? Summon them with wave stones , but beware their greater power ... Puoi inoltre testare resistenza modalità Infinita un'ambientazione dungeon dedicata , battere crescente pletora nemici ! TramaOrchi elfi bosco Loidar guerra tempo immemore . Ma lotte son dovute cessaredi fronte nuovo potente nemico : l'Uomo , razza malvagia vuole far proprie foreste sacre sfruttarne risorse naturali . Davanti minaccia , elfi orchi dovuti giungere tregua fermare invasori.Ora piano arrestare umani deforestazione : trovare truppenei pressi regione boschiva sconfiggerne capitano . Ma regione protetta scudo magico può essere distrutto forza fisica . Per accedervi può solo usare Pietra Milius , pietra magica caverna margini foresta , trasporta tocca un'altra caverna regione umani.Ma ' altro problema : sì , orchi elfi acconsentito tregua , uni fidano abilità altri completare missione . Così deciso inviare guerriero ciascuna razza . Gli elfi scelto Tinargey ( Stella Fuoco Eterno ) Arson , graziosa abile fanciulla elfica , esperta nell'antico segreto dell'arte fuoco . Gli orchi scelto Vrok Plunder , turbolento bestione armato grande ascia battaglia , letale braccia , gambe , mascelle duro testone.Entrambi entrano caverna due posti diversi dirigono pietra magica , raggiungendola stesso momento . La pietra teletrasporta caverna destinazione , risultato inaspettato : viaggio magico previsto due esseri stesso tempo ora l'orco donna elfo fusi.Così adesso ' solo corpo abitato due individui , impara far emergere l'uno l'altra seconda necessità.Una volta abituati nuovo corpo , due introducono terre nemiche , passando unbosco deforestato , seguito villaggio , ricerca nuovi nemici tenaci . Dopo ciò , dirigeranno montagne sconfiggere stregone scudo tenuto genti fuori territori umani . Infine , orchi elfi aiuteranno eroi occupare castello eliminare capitano umano nell'alta torre palazzo.Il bosco nuovo salvo orchi elfi possono riprendere felici guerre sanguinarie . Ma Arson & Plunder™ ancora imprigionati stesso corpo ' potere magico sufficiente foresta grado sciogliere l'incantesimo . A truly global game , FHM is the deepest , most immersive , and most customizable hockey management game the world . Choose one of 21 leagues around the globe and select team to guide to glory - or create your own hockey universe , or choose historical start date as far back as 1931 . Sign free agents , trade players , draft the next crop of superstars , and much more ! This is as close as you 'll get to sitting General Manager 's office without drawing paycheck from team . Oversee team finances , keep an eye on the salary cap , hire your staff , put together trade packages , make contract offers to free agents , and draft the newest generation of stars.New For 2015New Game Engine : The heart and soul of FHM 2 - the game engine - has been completed redesigned from the ground up . This creates the most realistic results ever seen hockey simulation . With the new engine , every second of game is simulated and the engine keeps track of exactly which zones the puck and players are , at times . This allows us to simulate the flow of hockey game much better than before , with each event playing out through the engine.Revamped Tactics System : You can trade for , sign , draft and develop the best and most talented players , but that ’ s only part of the challenge Franchise Hockey Manager 2 . In order to truly reach full potential , you will need to put place the optimal strategies to get the most out of your players . The tactics system and the entire game engine Franchise Hockey Manager 2 has been rewritten . It is now far more robust , detailed and it provides far more depth , better immersion and bigger tactical challenge . Or , if you 'd prefer , you can have the computer take tactical control , or borrow successful tactic created by another user.Expansion : Want to bring pro hockey to your hometown or favorite city ? Franchise Hockey Manager 2 now supports expansion for the NHL and fictional leagues.If you ’ re the general manager of an existing team , you ’ ll have to make tough choices about which players to protect from the expansion draft - should you stick with your veteran goaltender or turn the reins over to your young unproven talent ? As an expansion franchise you will have the unique challenge of trying to build contender from the spare parts of other teams . But with shrewd moves and some patience , your new expansion franchise could quickly become contender ! Facegen : Franchise Hockey Manager 2 will bring Facegen technology to the series , to greatly enhance immersion . Players and coaches will receive individual portraits , wearing their team uniform or colours , and the pictures will age , gain or lose weight throughout career . Facegen also allows for custom user-created jerseys to be used for each team , as well as individual user-created portraits.And that 's only sampling of some of the new additions to FHM 2 . There ’ s also host of smaller changes that will have big impact on the game : A completely overhauled graphic user interface makes Franchise Hockey Manager much more visually appealing and easier to navigateGame Rating : FHM 2 features new way for you to evaluate the performance of your players - the Game Rating ( GR ) . During game , each event ( good or bad ) will change the GR , so you always know how well player performs on the ice . Since the calculation includes the role of the player and the situation on the ice , you can get pretty good picture of the performance . Not players are goal scorers and will have their names show the score sheet - now you can accurately track how everyone is contributing to your team 's success or failure , from your stay-at-home defensemen to your grinding 4th line forwards.Redesigned Fictional Mode : We have removed the fictional mode from FHM 2014 and replaced it with new version that is much more streamlined and stable . Now you can play with just one league ( or add major junior and/or farm team level if you like ) and form it to your liking by changing selected rules and option.Pre-season games : Need to make some tough roster decisions to get your team ready for the start of the season ? Before the regular season starts , use these games to prepare your team for the regular season and find out who will make the squad.Head coaches : It is now possible to hire head coach for your team and play as GM only.Historical changes : We 've added new historical seasons to the game , so you can start even further the past - the way back to 1931 . In addition , you can now continue your game when reaching the last historical year and turn your game into fictional league . We 've added historical dollar values and season preview , so you always know the situation for every season you are just about to start.Greatly expanded news section : We added many additional news types and expanded the text of news to give you more immersion and help bring your league to life.Basic online league support - Match wits with other human GM 's ! New player development systemNew training systemNew player rolesNew player happiness systemRetiring players can now become staff - Is your former star forward your next head coach ? Revised staff contractsNew player fatigue systemNew player consistency systemGM and Coach scoresRedesigned screens , such as lines , tactics , manager-home , and playoff screensExtended draft logs - Looking back to see who some of your draft busts and booms were is quick and easy.Player award icons on the player profile pagePlayer summary pop-ups when you hover over player 's name ... and many more new features and cosmetic changes ! + Stairs Sviluppato : GreyLight Entertainment Pubblicato : Digital Tribe Informazioni giocoSTAIRSis first-person atmospheric psychological horror game that takes players through the stories of three missing people as seen through the eyes of journalist Christopher Adams . Start preparing yourself now , for to descend down these steps is to descend into madness.STAIRSis inspired by real-life events , twisted into an original tale of terror , despair and sadness . Using camera and journal , players set out to unravel the grizzly mysteries behind three stories - Valerie Berkley , high school graduate ; James Reed , young businessman ; and Jean Jowars Remens , charismatic pastor . What happened to them ? What do they have to do with each other ? Creep down the stairs and discover the truth for yourself… if you dare.FEATURES INCLUDEA tale of psychological horror that spans 3 diverse story arcs with thematic connectionsInspired by series of horrific real-life events , recreated with twist of fictionUse your camera to capture supernatural elements that progress the story and open new areasUtilize notes your Journal to help track your progress , story beats and evaluate cluesDynamic , immersive sound design sends chills down your spine while building palpable tensionReal-time story elements unravel the game ’ s narrative without interrupting gameplayExplore interactive environments and solve cleverly crafted puzzles to find what you need to advance through the story+ NBA 2K16 Sviluppato : Visual Concepts Pubblicato : 2K Informazioni giocoLa saga NBA 2K tornata l'esperienza gioco NBA realistica sempre : arriva NBA 2K16 ! A thick row of little flags or mini-scarfs dangling from suction cups on the windshield may be part of trucker culture , but it is more appropriate for tuning truck show rather than for everyday use on the highway.+ Lost Horizon 2 ( Europe ) Sviluppato : Animation Arts GmbH Pubblicato : Ravenscourt Informazioni giocoIn the shadow of the Cold War , Fenton Paddock is facing the hardest fight of his life . His adventure leads Fenton far beyond the Iron Curtain and finally onwards to mysterious , uncharted territory . Why did they put crystal necklace on me ? As she wakes up , Luna has no idea where she is . She is alone ... or is she ? Help her discover this strange world , survive the many challenges that await her , work out the secret of the Crystalline Expanse and ultimately escape.Luna Sky delivers story you will never forget and game you won ’ t be able to put down.Features:5 unique worlds . 4 of these levels are dedicated to special skill you pick up along the wayFull controller supportFully voiced cut-scenesSuper tight physics-based platform game with much room to improve your skillMultiple upgradesFantastic soundtrack with 5 different composers , giving each level special feelingLoads of fun extras to enjoyPlease NoteThis is game of exploration . There are no tutorials.How the game progressesThe game starts with Luna being rather weak.As the game progresses , she gets upgrades to her existing abilities - for instance - running and jumping powers on the first level . On the second level , she gains double jump ability which can be used to gain speed , halting mid-air or overcoming obstacles.Each skill you unlock can also be used to play previous levels and maybe access new areas within levels ! Do n't forgetIt is helpful to read the Hints on each level . They are accessed through the pause menu - press ESC on keyboard or the start button on your gamepad.+ Dorke and Ymp Sviluppato : Norse Piko Interactive Pubblicato : Piko Interactive LLC Classics Digital Informazioni giocoDorke and Ymp is an unreleased Super Nintendo game developed back the early 1990 's by Swedish company called Norse . The game was developed with unlicensed tools made by the game programmers . Unfortunately the game failed to acquire publisher and was never released.Luckily we found the original programmer , composer , and artist and we acquired the source code at about 50 % of the game . We worked on the game for over year to finally complete it.This are the new features and updates done to the game : •Over 100 Bugs and Crashing bugs fixed ! •Added whole new world and levels ( Volcano ) •Added Menu , cut-scenes and ending.•Implemented password system•Designed , developed and implemented boss fights ( 4 ) according to the original game story.•Organized the game to be able to play with continuity.•Over 40 levels and 10 hours of gameplay ! This game is puzzle adventure platformer which you got to help Dorke ( and Ymp ) to do some errands for your evil Master Wizard exchange of training you and teaching you his magic spells.The game is very very hard and challenging , but hardcore games will have fun playing it ! + Prison Architect Sviluppato : Double Eleven Introversion Software Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Informazioni giocoBenvenuti , direttori penitenziari ! Espandete impero senza limiti modalità Libera.+ 2064 : Read Only Memories Sviluppato : MidBoss , LLC . Pubblicato : MidBoss , LLC . Informazioni gioco2064 : Read Only Memoriesmerges old-school adventure gaming with modern storytelling to explore some of the social challenges we will face the near future . Explore the colorful future metropolis of Neo-San Francisco , meeting huge cast of fascinating characters and solving far-reaching mystery . Think carefully about your choices , because you never know how they will affect this dynamic , branching narrative further down the line.The world is changing.Genetic alteration of humans is now commonplace , with many choosing to radically alter their bodies to express their individuality . Virtual intelligences called ROMs ( Relationship and Organizational Managers ) , created as simple digital assistants , are exerting greater control over people ’ s lives . Some are terrified by this rapid change , and they are willing to go to extreme lengths to prevent it.A lost ROM named Turing breaks into the apartment of struggling journalist to ask for help . They claim to be the first sapient machine—not simulation of life but genuinely self-aware artificial being—and the technical genius who created them has gone missing . Can you unravel the shocking conspiracy that threatens to rock an entire society ? Or will the darkness that lies behind the bright neon lights of Neo-SF consume you ? Old-school , cutting-edge- Classic point-and-click adventuring inspired by the likes of Gabriel Knight and Snatcher is melded with modern branching storytelling that delves into identity , individuality , and what it means to be human.People of the future- Get to know diverse cross-section of Neo-SF ’ s population , brought to life by some of the best voice talent working games today , including and ( ) , ( ) , Austin Creed ( WWE ’ s ) , and internet stars Jim Sterling ( ) and SungWon Cho ( ) .High tech nostalgia- The city of Neo-San Francisco is rendered beautiful pixel art , and your adventure is accompanied by catchy low-fi electronic synth soundtrack.Solve the mystery- Enjoy over ten hours of adventure gaming goodness , featuring exploration , dynamic branching conversations , multiple endings , and many challenges to overcome.The definitive PC edition- Since its launch two years ago , the team has made many improvements and additions to an already amazing game , making this the ultimate version . Additions have included new characters and voice performers , additional facial animations , Japanese language support , and the “ Endless Christmas ” extended epilogue that allows you to hang out with your favorite Neo-SF locals.Note : Steam cloud saves currently only work on the same platform ( i.e . But he does not want to give up the world to these ferocious beasts . So with what little hope he has left , he will venture out of his caves , to find the only thing , that could save the world as he knows it - A female specimen to rebuild the cavemen civilization . But doing that wo n't be easy as the world is full of these dangerous creatures and other deadly hazards ! With your gunship , fight zero-g through vast , procedurally generated underground facility to recover the technology you need to escape the many dangers hidden around every corner . Featuring brand new expansion that adds hours of new content , the action is more intense than ever.The Redux expansion brings many new features to the game , including restructured campaign , new enemies , difficulty modes , new starting classes and much more.Strap on your Oculus Rift or HTC Vive and experience Sublevel Zero Virtual Reality with an immersive cockpit view and VR-enabled weaponry.Please note : It is suggested that Sublevel Zero Redux VR players use traditional gane controller . The game is NOT compatible with VR controllers.Your gunship is free to fly and rotate directions . You can attack from any angle , and so can your enemies . Inspired by classics such as Descent and Forsaken , Sublevel Zero ’ s retro gravity-defying combat is driven by modern looting and crafting.No lives . No saves . Fight your way through different procedurally generated environment every time . Make every shot , every decision count . A wide range of environments stand your way , from industrial zones to mining caverns . Think on your feet and adapt to each one ’ s hazards before it ’ s too late.Collect wide range of randomly-generated weapons , upgrades and game-changing items . Craft them together to equip your gunship for your play style . Bedlam is set entirely the first-person but will explore other game genres from first-person perspective.In the game you play Heather Quinn ( aka Athena ) colleague of Ross Baker ( aka Bedlam ) . Heather is an overworked and underpaid scientist developing medical technology for corporate giant Neurosphere . One rainy Monday morning Heather volunteers as test candidate for the new Neurosphere brain scanning tech - anything to get out of the office for few hours.But when she gets out of the scanner she discovers she 's not only escaped the office , but possibly escaped real life for good ! Heather finds herself trapped Starfire - the violent sci-fi game she spent her teenage years playing - with no explanation , no backup and , most terrifyingly , no way out ! Join us Early Access and get ready to unleash BEDLAM.The description below was written by Christopher Brookmyre for the release of the novel 2013Heaven is prison . Hell is playground.Would it be your ultimate fantasy to enter the world of video game ? A realm where you don ’ t have to go to work or worry about your health ; where you can look like hero or goddess ; where you can fly space-ships , slay dragons , visit any period history , any realm fiction , yet of it feels completely real . A realm where there are no consequences and no responsibilities , to the extent that even if you die , you can just respawn and start again.Or would it be your worst nightmare ? Trapped place where every demon ever conjured by the human mind can be made flesh . Cut off from the real world , unable to see your family or friends ever again . Stuck an endless state of war and chaos where the pain and fear feels real and from which not even death can offer an escape.Prison or playground . Heaven or hell.This is where you find outCheck out the first hands on preview of Bedlam by Rock , Paper , Shotgun : One of the first Bedlam play thru 's by Jim Sterling of The Escapist : And coverage about our female lead character Heather Quinn by BBC News : + The Jackbox Party Pack 2 Sviluppato : Jackbox Games , Inc. Bidiots ( 3-6 players ) The absurd art auction game where you draw right there on your phone or tablet . Quiplash XL ( 3-8 players ) The say-anything , gut-busting Quiplash XL , which includes everything Quiplash , Quip Pack 1 , AND over 100 brand-new prompts ! Bomb Corp. ( 1-4 players ) The bomb-defusing nailbiter of party game ! As interns at Bomb Corp. , you must defuse random bombs the office order to keep your jobs . You ’ ll probably die , but it ’ ll be good work experience ! Players play using their phones , tablets , or even computers as controllers – making it the perfect easy-to-join party starter . You will have to ensure that they have constant supply ofoxygen , foodandwaterto stay alive.You will get them to collect energy , extract water , mine metal , grow food , manufacture bots , and build fully self-sufficient base harsh environment , where you are always one step away from total failure.Even if the game is not intended to be simulator , the mechanics are plausible , and based on what the expected challenges of establishing colony an new planet would be.Features : Four different planetswith different conditions and increasing difficulty.Harnesssolar and wind energy ( if available ) order to power the base 's structures.Grow hydroponicVegetablesand synthesizeVitromeatto feed your population.Mine and produce raw resources , process them , manufacture goods , and establish production chain.Carefully manage the colonist immigration flow to ensure you have the people with the right skills.Survive disasters likemeteors , sandstormsorsolar flaresand defend your base fromintruders.Mechanize your base by creating your ownbotsthat will help with the more arduous tasks.Grow your colony from few initial pioneers to vibrant planetbase withhundreds of colonists.215 giocatori giocando ora Steam+ Mushroom 11 Sviluppato : Untame Pubblicato : Untame Informazioni giocoDelete it and it will grow.Mold an amorphous organism into any shape by pruning its cells . New cells will immediately grow , allowing you to traverse mysterious world across brain-twisting obstacles , overcome swarms of bizarre mutated creatures , and understand the true nature of the devastation from which you emerged . The Earth is gone , shattered to pieces . Nothing remains but huge ring of rocky debris . Nobody knows why the Gate malfunctioned . It was built to connect our world to other stars , but only handful of colony ships were sent away before disaster struck . The Gate is believed to have unexpectedly connected to the wrong star -one just going nova . Torrents of gravitational waves flooded our solar system and the Earth was immediately obliterated . The Gate then started connecting to random stars , spewing ashes from dying worlds , radiation from younger suns or even drawing alien lifeforms . The solar system began to change.Humans and their machines live on : pockets of civilization have gathered into warring factions . Many adventurers roam the cold wastes their spaceships , defying death and perils unknown -there are countless tales of monstrous machines and alien creatures preying on hapless ships . Real menaces or mere fantasies ? Who can now part the myth from the ever-changing reality ? In world where humans , monsters and machine-gods fight for survival , something will eventually have to give . You play the role of young adventurer , who just got his hands on his first spaceship , and is determined to make name for himself . A routine scouting mission turns out to be something much greater when you encounter an A.I . called Ceres.Key Features : • Single-player tactical space combat.• Lead squadron of ships and fight through mission-drive storyline the way you see fit.• Third person view and simple yet deep point-and-click order system.• Your ships not only unleash deadly lasers or missiles , but it is possible to launch hacking attacks to damage or even take control of enemy ships ! • Manage your set of skills as you gain experience . Special perks also appear when you perform well.• Hire captains and crews for your squadron ’ s ships . Watch them gain experience as they fight by your side.• Heavily customize your ships with equipment or weapons of different origins . Modify ship ’ s modules , armor , weapons , sensors or counter-measures.• Dozens of ship types which can be acquired and commanded , from the smallest corvette to the mightiest battleship.• Advanced damage system : ships can suffer critical and system failures combat.• Loot anything that floats space , trade items around the solar system to gain extra income , or salvage wrecked ships and even capture hostile vessels with boarding drones.+ Knights of Pen and Paper 2 - Deluxiest Edition Sviluppato : Kyy Games Pubblicato : Paradox Interactive Informazioni giocoPrepare to join Knights of Pen & Paper 2 turn-based , retro style , pixel-art adventure full of danger , intrigue , and semi-appropriate cultural references ! Pubblicato : Wube Software LTD. Factorio PC gioco simulazione costruzione gestione . Fun fact te : gioco presente nuova specie scorpione prende nome stesso videogioco ! È stato scoperto padre sviluppatore chiamato così figlio , collegando sempre due posteri : papà fantastico , senza ombra dubbio ! Qual storia ? Assumi personaggio ingegnere atterrato pianeta obiettivo finale costruire un'astronave permetta lasciare pianeta invocare aiuto , puoi prenderti tempo completare compito esplorare completamente mondo prima portare uomo casa . Puoi giocare , seconda esigenze , modalità singolo , modalità cooperativa multiplayer.A differenza maggior parte raccolta risorse giochi creazione , gioco bisogno creare enormi quantità oggetti , compito disporre file file fabbriche , ognuna quali creerà parti necessarie produrre altri beni : puoi persino creare fabbriche realizzare componenti altre fabbriche ! Sarebbe giusto dire invece creare , imposti processi creazione.Se sembra confusionario , preoccuparti , ' buon tutorial dettagliato spiegherà ciò devi sapere iniziare strada serio allevamento intensivo senza stress frustrazione alcuna ! Non industriale peròIl pianeta privo abitanti tre tipi animali / creature vivono pianeta . Si chiamano Biters , Spitters , Worms solito pacifici , tranne quando l'inquinamento fabbriche avvelena cibo l'acqua ! Queste creature attaccheranno , diventando sempre viziose , seconda ’ aumento ’ inquinamento.Puoi affrontarli due modi : gestendo inquinamento producendo meno , oppure costruendo difese tenere lontane bestie , addirittura ucciderle ; difese possono trarre vantaggio processi automazione.Come costruire fabbricaCi tre componenti principali costruzione fabbrica , devono essere posizionati modo appropriato numeri giusti raggiungere scopo desiderato : Nastri trasportatori : trasporta materie prime estraendo , portandole fabbrica pronte fase successiva.Assemblatori : pezzi poco pratici fabbrica sfornano tutte parti bisogno.Inseritori : processi automatizzati adattano parti realizzate assemblatori creare prodotto bisogno.Puoi creare processi fabbrica qualsiasi cosa , realizzare parti necessarie costruire fabbriche , finché arrivi posizione l'espansione inevitabile quasi senza sforzo ! Il gioco tema oscuro dispotico : umani fatti guerra fino all'estinzione , l'aiuto esseri extra-dimensionali.Informazioni giocoAmbientato mondo immaginario Cairn , esseri umani , certo punto passato , entrati comunicazione esseri altre dimensioni , Eterici . Tuttavia , ricercatori scoprono essere posseduti Eterici permette avere sensi acuiti abilità precedentemente sconosciute.Portando troppo avanti `` ricerca '' , umani portano sempre eterici fino quando , inevitabilmente , alcuni scappano creano propri portali attirare orde compagni Cairn . Intendono utilizzare corpi umani risorsa raggiungere propri fini.A punto , entrano gioco Chthoniani , nemici giurati Eterici . Ma punto intenzione aiutare umani : modo semplice impedire eterici usare corpi umani togliere materia prima estinguere umani ... Così Chthoniani mettono atto piano modo feroce popolazione umana viene devastata , tessuto stesso realtà viene distorto , dando origine nuovi peggiori orrori ... È punto , alcuni anni dopo , viene stabilito nuovo status quo , qui inizia gioco . Gli umani vivono piccole enclavi , nascondendosi entrambi gruppi esseri cercando trovare modo resistere senza essere schiacciati . Alcuni umani poteri insoliti posseduti eterici , alcuni detestano , altri vedono piccolo segnale speranza successo poveri umani perdenti.Modalità giocoIl gioco mix sandboxing open world gioco arco narrativo . In gioco importante motivi : cibo sempre sapore migliore po ' sale , proprietà salvavita . Il sale provoca grande dolore eterici , quindi tengono lontani . Ciò significa tracciare linee sacca sale ( generi posizione ) può tenerli lontani te . Loro riescono superare linee provano , quindi essere troppo compiaciuto ! of Orion Sviluppato : NGD Studios Pubblicato : Wargaming Labs Informazioni giocoMaster Of Orion – Conquer the StarsThe ascendant spacefaring 4X strategy game returns ! A new chapter the epic Master of Orion saga is poised to once again capture the imaginations of millions of gamers.Diehard fans of the first games will be ecstatic to know that this revival is being built under the watchful eyes of members from the original development team , conjunction with NGD Studios Buenos Aires ! Discover Master of Orion as it was always meant to be : A fully orchestrated score , interstellar warfare and exploration against the backdrop of beautifully animated far flung galaxies . Confront hostile civilizations , negotiate with mysterious aliens , share knowledge with allies and uncover this newly imagined universe.Just sampling of the features you will find : All 10 original Master of Orion races , brought to life through compelling AI and award-winning voice acting talentOver 75 researchable technological advancementsVast galaxies featuring up to 100 different solar systems , each composed of myriad planets and starsCustomizable ships with diverse styles for each raceMultiple ways to win – including conquest , technological , diplomatic , and moreEnthralling gameplay that will have you saying “ just one more turn ” again and againAnd the Collector ’ s Edition : The exclusive Terran race of militant humans to play the gameSpecial pixelated ship models available the game for more retro feelAll three legendary original games – Master of Orion 1 , 2 , and 3A nearly 300-page Art Book ( digital format ) showing the progress of the game ’ s art along with the original concept art and line drawingsMusic files from the game and printable music scores+ LiEat Sviluppato : △○□× ( Miwashiba ) Pubblicato : PLAYISM Informazioni giocoEfina is very special young girl . She 's curious . She 's optimistic . She has the power to make lies manifest themselves as physical beings , which then become her own sustenance.She 's also dragon.LiEat is the classic story of vagabond traversing strange and mysterious world together with dragon protégé , buying and selling secrets , while also attempting to uncover the truth about themselves . Along the way , they 'll discover web of arcane mysteries , meet variety of colorful characters ( including other dragons ) , and shed light on events of the past which ultimately served to lead them to where―and who―they are today.The epic tale of LiEat is composed of three fantastical , bite-sized chapters : Chapter I introduces Efina and her caretaker―the multinominal Leo―as they happen upon small town with big secret . As Efina starts to perceive and understand the world around her new and different light , the pair finds that the legends of beings which haunt the night are more than just tales told to frighten children ... Chapter II finds Efina and Hal ( formerly Leo ) investigating rumors of something magical and possibly dangerous inside resort casino . Posing as newly-assigned guard , Hal arranges room and board for himself and Efina―however , they quickly to the jarring realization that roof over one ’ s head and bed to sleep do not safe haven make.The final chapter of LiEat brings Efina and the newly rechristened Sid ( Leo/Hal ) to lavish mansion to foil the plans of master thief . However , the wake of the great robbery , Sid discovers that the heist itself was only the tip of the iceberg , and Efina watches as his past―As well as his lies―finally catch up to them both.For the first time ever , this beloved trilogy that has long been treasured by JRPG enthusiasts can now be enjoyed its entirety on Steam one single comprehensive package ! In collaboration with the original developer ( and featuring translation painstakingly crafted by longtime fan ) , PLAYISM is proud to finally bring LiEat to the entire world ! Engaging and emotionally resounding JRPG storytellingEntrancing atmospheric music that seamlessly transports the player into the world of LiEat ( * Purchase of the game includes the OST ! Make sure to check your Local folder . ) Myriad hidden items and conversations spread throughout the gameMultiple achievements for each chapter of the gameAll three chapters one package ; no DLC , just the whole storySpecial Thanks to vgperson and SmokingWolf+ On My Own Sviluppato : Beach Interactive Close Studios Pubblicato : Beach Interactive Informazioni giocoTest your survival ingenuity four unique biomes—Woodland , Woodland Lake , Alpine Tundra , & Mountain— , while imbibing charming pixel art , chill music , and thought-provoking quotes along the way.Explore & SurviveEach biome contains unique flora , fauna , and challenges . Players will need to hunt , trap , and gather to survive.Crafting SystemCombine gathered items by trial and error to produce tools that aid survival.Strategic SurvivalStay warm and well fed any season by stocking up , making smart decisions , and crafting key items.Unfolding MysteryWho built the abandoned shelters and left behind letters containing survival clues ? And why ? Deliverance is poised upon three Dwarven astronauts who are sent on an expedition to find new star the depths of the Endless Stone . Take control of Forcer , Smashfist , and Shadow as they explore the unknown territories of the stone universe while meeting new civilizations and ancient monsters from the deep layers of space.We Are The Dwarves is an action-based tactical adventure with active pause ( extreme slowdown of time ) placing you control of three Dwarven astronauts . Forcer is capable of ranged destruction , and timely set-up exectution . Smashfist , brute at heart , gets up close and personal with rage worth avoiding . Shadow stays just where you 'd expect him to , launching deadly successive assassinations and precision archery from afar . As trio , combine each dwarfs attack styles into orchestrated destruction against your foe.Features of We Are The Dwarves -Three distinct characters , each with an array of abilities and talents.Individual skill trees for each dwarf ; customization varies from stealth to slasher​.Pause and queue gameplay - slow time and set up series of commands to be executed.Enemies vary sense interaction , picking up movement , ambient noise and scent.+ Stardew Valley Sviluppato : ConcernedApe Pubblicato : ConcernedApe Stardew Valley PC gioco consente giocatori allontanarsi trambusto vita quotidiana , scuola lavoro . Il giocatore può vedere prendere controllo fattoria leggermente fatiscente , lavorando raccogliere colture , fondi regali artigianali vicini molto altro ancora . È gioco simulazione fattorie ruolo , ’ azione dedicata orientata ’ agricoltura piuttosto solite tattiche battaglia gung-ho ’ altra tipologia gioco ruolo.Informazioni giocoAi giocatori viene dato diario online iscritti compiti attuali : completamento successo ciascuno , assicura poter richiedere premio vedere prossimo conto.Nel calendario , estremamente semplificato , quattro stagioni , ciascuna durata circa ventotto giorni ’ interno ogni stagione , alcuni compiti dovrebbero essere svolti dentro determinato periodo tempo . È impossibile coltivare prodotti fuori stagione senza serra . Usa diario guida gioco elenco cose fare assicurarti annaffiare ciò bisogno essere annaffiato , pianta colture devono essere piantate particolare periodo mese raccogli pronte.Fai attenzione uscire pazzo quando lasci fattoria senza cibo portata mano : rimani senza energia , dovrai spendere considerevole quantità d ’ oro essere trasportato casa recuperare perso . Verrà preso inoltre certo numero oggetti preziosi ’ inventario ; ciò dovrebbe essere avvertimento sufficiente maggior parte persone farlo volta ! Vantaggi MultiplayerIl gioco funziona molto bene giocatore singolo ’ aggiunta multiplayer dopo ’ uscita iniziale stata ’ idea eccellente . Tu amici vita reale potete formare comunità agricola online , lavorando accanto ’ altro , regalandovi reciprocamente prodotti eccesso oggetti artigianali lavorando terra creare sente sorprendentemente vera comunità lavorano duramente traggono benefici extra necessari.Supporta prova tempoA volte giochi simulazione d ’ agricoltura possono essere fantastici ’ inizio prima poi esaurisce ’ essere annoiati fare sempre cose , creando oggetti coltivando colture . Stardew evitato abilmente mantenendo alti livelli immersioni diversi modi : Vai appuntamento : villaggio pieno personaggi realisti , alcuni quali piaceranno , mentre altri eviteranno dovranno essere seguiti parlare . Puoi uscire PNG gioco , corteggiandolo portandolo vivere fattoria.Costruisci ponte : man mano avanzi gioco , ponti precedentemente rotti vengono riparati , dandoti nuove aree gioco puoi cercare , liberare terreno esplorare po ’ . Ci altri modi espandersi : trascurare vecchia stazione autobus.Il ’ oro : trovando spada , potrai portare personaggio miniera , troverai nemici sempre potenti . L ’ avvio nemici darà metalli puoi usare nuovi mestieri , inclusi alcuni oggetti sofisticati ! Continua coltivare : routine quotidiana continua , diario fedele dà spinta ogni volta bisogno ; troverai nuove colture piantare , nuove tecniche padroneggiare nuove ricette raccogliere ingredienti , mantenendo ’ interessa alto abbastanza continuare tornare , giorno dopo giorno nutrire polli , piantare semi , raccogliere raccolti.Stardew Valley PC disponibile all'acquisto Instant Gaming piccolissima parte prezzo dettaglio . As the natural successor to Reiza Studios´ previous title - the highly regarded , originally released 2013 - AUTOMOBILISTA continues to simulate the premium Brazilian racing series such as Stock Car V8 , Copa Petrobras de Marcas , Formula 3 Brasil and Mitsubishi Lancer Cup , now packing every car and every track from their respective 2015 championships.Beyond the brazilian core , AUTOMOBILISTAis extensively complemented with one of the most diverse selections or racing vehicles you will find racing game : only AUTOMOBILISTA will you be able to jump from rental kart to 800-HP single-seater ; from drifting Rallycross EvoX to jumping ramps Supertruck ; from mastering the driving basics Formula Vee to managing full 24h race an endurance prototype ; back and forth through historical and modern content featuring sample from several decades of racing history - of this and much more within few mouse clicks . Thoroughly researched and cohesively developed for maximum simulation accuracy , AUTOMOBILISTAcaptures the fun only motorsports its various forms can provide.In addition to the content already present Stock Car Extreme - of which comprehensively upgraded -AUTOMOBILISTAturns it up to new level by adding the new cars & tracks proposed the SimRacing Bonanza crowdfunding campaign , new simulation features such as dynamic track conditions , advanced transmission and tire modelling , substantial upgrades to physics , graphics & audio , new game modes and much more ! These are some of the features that make AUTOMOBILISTA stand out as purebred racing simulator : Upscaled 720 Hz physics and 500 Hz input rates grants AMS super-accurate , high fidelity physics and Force FeedbackVehicle physics based on models developed for professional racing teams with in-depth exclusive dataMinutely detailed and accurately modelled race tracks with 3D bumps with distinct surface propertiesEngine sounds sampled from high-quality recordings of real carsCapturing the ever-changing demands of racing.Cars with old-style gearbox mechanisms will demand proper gear engagement by using the clutch or synchronizing revs.Modern cars will demand handling of advanced electronic systems.High downforce cars will create an aerodynamic wake for those that follow.24h cycles will allow racing from dusk to dawn and at night.Dynamic track conditions turn the racing line into grippy rubbery trail and builds up marbles offlineDynamic tire damage & dirt pickup add further extra dimensions to the driving experiencesumption & estimate ; Small tire revision 86 version [ /list ] + Far Cry Primal : Legend of the Mammoth Sviluppato : Ubisoft Pubblicato : Ubisoft Informazioni giocoIl premiato franchise Far Cry , dopo aver visitato tropici l'Himalaya , avventura lotta sopravvivenza albori dell'umanità , innovativo sistema gioco mondo liberamente esplorabile , belve gigantesche , paesaggi mozzafiato imprevedibili incontri natura selvaggia.Benvenuto nell'età pietra , pericolo estremo avventure conoscono limiti . I sottotitoli italiano.+ Trulon : The Shadow Engine Sviluppato : Kyy Games Pubblicato : Headup Games Informazioni giocoEnter world of steampunk and magic by experiencing the debut title of the Trulon series . The adventure RPG is based on new novel from Jak Koke , an award-winning author who is known from the best-selling Shadowrun trilogy , The Dragon Heart Saga.Featuring unique card combat system that combines traditional deck management with random elements , the tactics are intuitively activated using over 50 cards an easy to play way . This makes both RPG veterans and new players feel immediately at home.Unravel the threads of an insidious plot and meet many multi-faceted characters . Led by the enchanting Gladia , you take control of four characters with different abilities each . They team up to adventure through the Trulon Universe where mysterious disease has spread through the kingdoms of Tripudia and Maelon . Using magical tactics , they try to survive the action packed battles against enemies mutated by magic and exciting steampunk machines.To let you enjoy the atmospheric music of the game beyond the game , its soundtrack will be included as free download.FEATURESFirst spin-off story from the original Trulon novelBeautiful setting featuring mix of steampunk and JRPGUnique card combat system with deep strategyBattle enemies using collection of over 50 unique cardsFour unique playable characters with individual strengths and play stylesOver hundred multi-faceted NPCs to interact withSolve challenging puzzlesThe package contains the complete soundtrack as well as two bonus tracksFirst sketches of the game world already showed up 2007 , before game designer Johan Lillbacka got touch with Jak Koke for writing novel placed the Trulon universe . That novel , ‘ Shadow Gears ’ , will be released 2016 as well . After the universe was set , Johan developed the stories of different characters for his game . He always loved sci-fi and fantasy , so the result was beautiful setting featuring mix of steampunk and JRPG , with fantastic machines that run on magical energy.+ Kona Sviluppato : Parabole Pubblicato : Parabole Ravenscourt Informazioni giocoCanada settentrionale . Ironico , arguto inquietante , tiene incollati schermo . Un gioco così bizzarro , coinvolgente affascinante merita un'occhiata . `` - John Walker , AmbientazioneOttobre 1970 . Il ricco industriale W.
